</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1760"></td>
        <td id="LC1760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The artilleryman agreed with me that the house was no place to stay in.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1761"></td>
        <td id="LC1761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He proposed, he said, to make his way Londonward, and thence rejoin his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1762"></td>
        <td id="LC1762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">battery—No. 12, of the Horse Artillery. My plan was to return at once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1763"></td>
        <td id="LC1763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Leatherhead; and so greatly had the strength of the Martians</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1764"></td>
        <td id="LC1764" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">impressed me that I had determined to take my wife to Newhaven, and go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1765" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1765"></td>
        <td id="LC1765" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with her out of the country forthwith. For I already perceived clearly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1766" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1766"></td>
        <td id="LC1766" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that the country about London must inevitably be the scene of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1767" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1767"></td>
        <td id="LC1767" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">disastrous struggle before such creatures as these could be destroyed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1768" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1768"></td>
        <td id="LC1768" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1769" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1769"></td>
        <td id="LC1769" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Between us and Leatherhead, however, lay the third cylinder, with its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1770" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1770"></td>
        <td id="LC1770" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guarding giants. Had I been alone, I think I should have taken my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1771" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1771"></td>
        <td id="LC1771" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chance and struck across country. But the artilleryman dissuaded me:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1772" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1772"></td>
        <td id="LC1772" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s no kindness to the right sort of wife,” he said, “to make her a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1773" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1773"></td>
        <td id="LC1773" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">widow”; and in the end I agreed to go with him, under cover of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1774" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1774"></td>
        <td id="LC1774" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods, northward as far as Street Cobham before I parted with him.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1775" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1775"></td>
        <td id="LC1775" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thence I would make a big detour by Epsom to reach Leatherhead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1776" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1776"></td>
        <td id="LC1776" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1777" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1777"></td>
        <td id="LC1777" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should have started at once, but my companion had been in active</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1778" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1778"></td>
        <td id="LC1778" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">service and he knew better than that. He made me ransack the house for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1779" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1779"></td>
        <td id="LC1779" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a flask, which he filled with whisky; and we lined every available</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1780" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1780"></td>
        <td id="LC1780" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pocket with packets of biscuits and slices of meat. Then we crept out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1781" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1781"></td>
        <td id="LC1781" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the house, and ran as quickly as we could down the ill-made road by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1782"></td>
        <td id="LC1782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which I had come overnight. The houses seemed deserted. In the road lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1783" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1783"></td>
        <td id="LC1783" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a group of three charred bodies close together, struck dead by the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1784" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1784"></td>
        <td id="LC1784" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heat-Ray; and here and there were things that people had dropped—a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1785" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1785"></td>
        <td id="LC1785" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clock, a slipper, a silver spoon, and the like poor valuables. At the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1786" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1786"></td>
        <td id="LC1786" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corner turning up towards the post office a little cart, filled with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1787" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1787"></td>
        <td id="LC1787" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boxes and furniture, and horseless, heeled over on a broken wheel. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1788" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1788"></td>
        <td id="LC1788" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cash box had been hastily smashed open and thrown under the debris.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1789" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1789"></td>
        <td id="LC1789" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1790" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1790"></td>
        <td id="LC1790" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Except the lodge at the Orphanage, which was still on fire, none of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1791" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1791"></td>
        <td id="LC1791" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses had suffered very greatly here. The Heat-Ray had shaved the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1792" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1792"></td>
        <td id="LC1792" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chimney tops and passed. Yet, save ourselves, there did not seem to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1793" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1793"></td>
        <td id="LC1793" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a living soul on Maybury Hill. The majority of the inhabitants had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1794" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1794"></td>
        <td id="LC1794" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">escaped, I suppose, by way of the Old Woking road—the road I had taken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1795" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1795"></td>
        <td id="LC1795" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">when I drove to Leatherhead—or they had hidden.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1796" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1796"></td>
        <td id="LC1796" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1797"></td>
        <td id="LC1797" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We went down the lane, by the body of the man in black, sodden now from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1798" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1798"></td>
        <td id="LC1798" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the overnight hail, and broke into the woods at the foot of the hill.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1799"></td>
        <td id="LC1799" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We pushed through these towards the railway without meeting a soul. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1800"></td>
        <td id="LC1800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods across the line were but the scarred and blackened ruins of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1801"></td>
        <td id="LC1801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods; for the most part the trees had fallen, but a certain proportion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1802"></td>
        <td id="LC1802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still stood, dismal grey stems, with dark brown foliage instead of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1803"></td>
        <td id="LC1803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">green.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1804"></td>
        <td id="LC1804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1805"></td>
        <td id="LC1805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">On our side the fire had done no more than scorch the nearer trees; it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1806"></td>
        <td id="LC1806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had failed to secure its footing. In one place the woodmen had been at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1807"></td>
        <td id="LC1807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work on Saturday; trees, felled and freshly trimmed, lay in a clearing,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1808"></td>
        <td id="LC1808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with heaps of sawdust by the sawing-machine and its engine. Hard by was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1809"></td>
        <td id="LC1809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a temporary hut, deserted. There was not a breath of wind this morning,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1810"></td>
        <td id="LC1810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and everything was strangely still. Even the birds were hushed, and as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1811"></td>
        <td id="LC1811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we hurried along I and the artilleryman talked in whispers and looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1812"></td>
        <td id="LC1812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">now and again over our shoulders. Once or twice we stopped to listen.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1813"></td>
        <td id="LC1813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1814"></td>
        <td id="LC1814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After a time we drew near the road, and as we did so we heard the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1815"></td>
        <td id="LC1815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clatter of hoofs and saw through the tree stems three cavalry soldiers</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1816"></td>
        <td id="LC1816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">riding slowly towards Woking. We hailed them, and they halted while we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1817"></td>
        <td id="LC1817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hurried towards them. It was a lieutenant and a couple of privates of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1818"></td>
        <td id="LC1818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the 8th Hussars, with a stand like a theodolite, which the artilleryman</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1819"></td>
        <td id="LC1819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">told me was a heliograph.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1820"></td>
        <td id="LC1820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1821"></td>
        <td id="LC1821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You are the first men I’ve seen coming this way this morning,” said</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1822"></td>
        <td id="LC1822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the lieutenant. “What’s brewing?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1823"></td>
        <td id="LC1823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1824"></td>
        <td id="LC1824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His voice and face were eager. The men behind him stared curiously. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1825"></td>
        <td id="LC1825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artilleryman jumped down the bank into the road and saluted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1826"></td>
        <td id="LC1826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1827"></td>
        <td id="LC1827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Gun destroyed last night, sir. Have been hiding. Trying to rejoin</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1828"></td>
        <td id="LC1828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">battery, sir. You’ll come in sight of the Martians, I expect, about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1829"></td>
        <td id="LC1829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">half a mile along this road.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1830"></td>
        <td id="LC1830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1831"></td>
        <td id="LC1831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What the dickens are they like?” asked the lieutenant.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1832"></td>
        <td id="LC1832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1833"></td>
        <td id="LC1833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Giants in armour, sir. Hundred feet high. Three legs and a body like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1834"></td>
        <td id="LC1834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">’luminium, with a mighty great head in a hood, sir.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1835"></td>
        <td id="LC1835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1836"></td>
        <td id="LC1836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Get out!” said the lieutenant. “What confounded nonsense!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1837"></td>
        <td id="LC1837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1838"></td>
        <td id="LC1838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You’ll see, sir. They carry a kind of box, sir, that shoots fire and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1839"></td>
        <td id="LC1839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">strikes you dead.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1840"></td>
        <td id="LC1840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1841"></td>
        <td id="LC1841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What d’ye mean—a gun?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1842"></td>
        <td id="LC1842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1843"></td>
        <td id="LC1843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No, sir,” and the artilleryman began a vivid account of the Heat-Ray.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1844"></td>
        <td id="LC1844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Halfway through, the lieutenant interrupted him and looked up at me. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1845"></td>
        <td id="LC1845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was still standing on the bank by the side of the road.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1846"></td>
        <td id="LC1846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1847"></td>
        <td id="LC1847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s perfectly true,” I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1848"></td>
        <td id="LC1848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1849"></td>
        <td id="LC1849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well,” said the lieutenant, “I suppose it’s my business to see it too.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1850"></td>
        <td id="LC1850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Look here”—to the artilleryman—“we’re detailed here clearing people out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1851"></td>
        <td id="LC1851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of their houses. You’d better go along and report yourself to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1852"></td>
        <td id="LC1852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Brigadier-General Marvin, and tell him all you know. He’s at Weybridge.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1853"></td>
        <td id="LC1853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Know the way?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1854"></td>
        <td id="LC1854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1855"></td>
        <td id="LC1855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do,” I said; and he turned his horse southward again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1856"></td>
        <td id="LC1856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1857"></td>
        <td id="LC1857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Half a mile, you say?” said he.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1858"></td>
        <td id="LC1858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1859"></td>
        <td id="LC1859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“At most,” I answered, and pointed over the treetops southward. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1860"></td>
        <td id="LC1860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thanked me and rode on, and we saw them no more.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1861"></td>
        <td id="LC1861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1862"></td>
        <td id="LC1862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Farther along we came upon a group of three women and two children in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1863"></td>
        <td id="LC1863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the road, busy clearing out a labourer’s cottage. They had got hold of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1864"></td>
        <td id="LC1864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a little hand truck, and were piling it up with unclean-looking bundles</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1865"></td>
        <td id="LC1865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and shabby furniture. They were all too assiduously engaged to talk to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1866"></td>
        <td id="LC1866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">us as we passed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1867"></td>
        <td id="LC1867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1868"></td>
        <td id="LC1868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">By Byfleet station we emerged from the pine trees, and found the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1869"></td>
        <td id="LC1869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">country calm and peaceful under the morning sunlight. We were far</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1870"></td>
        <td id="LC1870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beyond the range of the Heat-Ray there, and had it not been for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1871"></td>
        <td id="LC1871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent desertion of some of the houses, the stirring movement of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1872"></td>
        <td id="LC1872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">packing in others, and the knot of soldiers standing on the bridge over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1873"></td>
        <td id="LC1873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the railway and staring down the line towards Woking, the day would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1874"></td>
        <td id="LC1874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have seemed very like any other Sunday.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1875"></td>
        <td id="LC1875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1876"></td>
        <td id="LC1876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Several farm waggons and carts were moving creakily along the road to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1877"></td>
        <td id="LC1877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Addlestone, and suddenly through the gate of a field we saw, across a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1878"></td>
        <td id="LC1878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stretch of flat meadow, six twelve-pounders standing neatly at equal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1879"></td>
        <td id="LC1879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distances pointing towards Woking. The gunners stood by the guns</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1880"></td>
        <td id="LC1880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waiting, and the ammunition waggons were at a business-like distance.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1881"></td>
        <td id="LC1881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The men stood almost as if under inspection.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1882"></td>
        <td id="LC1882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1883"></td>
        <td id="LC1883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That’s good!” said I. “They will get one fair shot, at any rate.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1884"></td>
        <td id="LC1884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1885"></td>
        <td id="LC1885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The artilleryman hesitated at the gate.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1886"></td>
        <td id="LC1886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1887"></td>
        <td id="LC1887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I shall go on,” he said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1888"></td>
        <td id="LC1888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1889"></td>
        <td id="LC1889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Farther on towards Weybridge, just over the bridge, there were a number</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1890"></td>
        <td id="LC1890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of men in white fatigue jackets throwing up a long rampart, and more</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1891"></td>
        <td id="LC1891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">guns behind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1892"></td>
        <td id="LC1892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1893"></td>
        <td id="LC1893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It’s bows and arrows against the lightning, anyhow,” said the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1894"></td>
        <td id="LC1894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artilleryman. “They ’aven’t seen that fire-beam yet.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1895"></td>
        <td id="LC1895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1896"></td>
        <td id="LC1896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The officers who were not actively engaged stood and stared over the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1897"></td>
        <td id="LC1897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">treetops southwestward, and the men digging would stop every now and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1898"></td>
        <td id="LC1898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again to stare in the same direction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1899"></td>
        <td id="LC1899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1900"></td>
        <td id="LC1900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Byfleet was in a tumult; people packing, and a score of hussars, some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1901"></td>
        <td id="LC1901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of them dismounted, some on horseback, were hunting them about. Three</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1902"></td>
        <td id="LC1902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or four black government waggons, with crosses in white circles, and an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1903"></td>
        <td id="LC1903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old omnibus, among other vehicles, were being loaded in the village</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1904"></td>
        <td id="LC1904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">street. There were scores of people, most of them sufficiently</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1905"></td>
        <td id="LC1905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sabbatical to have assumed their best clothes. The soldiers were having</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1906"></td>
        <td id="LC1906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the greatest difficulty in making them realise the gravity of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1907"></td>
        <td id="LC1907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">position. We saw one shrivelled old fellow with a huge box and a score</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1908"></td>
        <td id="LC1908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or more of flower pots containing orchids, angrily expostulating with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1909"></td>
        <td id="LC1909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the corporal who would leave them behind. I stopped and gripped his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1910"></td>
        <td id="LC1910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">arm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1911"></td>
        <td id="LC1911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1912"></td>
        <td id="LC1912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Do you know what’s over there?” I said, pointing at the pine tops that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1913"></td>
        <td id="LC1913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hid the Martians.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1914"></td>
        <td id="LC1914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1915"></td>
        <td id="LC1915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Eh?” said he, turning. “I was explainin’ these is vallyble.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1916"></td>
        <td id="LC1916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1917"></td>
        <td id="LC1917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Death!” I shouted. “Death is coming! Death!” and leaving him to digest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1918"></td>
        <td id="LC1918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that if he could, I hurried on after the artillery-man. At the corner I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1919"></td>
        <td id="LC1919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looked back. The soldier had left him, and he was still standing by his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1920"></td>
        <td id="LC1920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">box, with the pots of orchids on the lid of it, and staring vaguely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1921"></td>
        <td id="LC1921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over the trees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1922"></td>
        <td id="LC1922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1923"></td>
        <td id="LC1923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No one in Weybridge could tell us where the headquarters were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1924"></td>
        <td id="LC1924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">established; the whole place was in such confusion as I had never seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1925"></td>
        <td id="LC1925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in any town before. Carts, carriages everywhere, the most astonishing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1926"></td>
        <td id="LC1926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">miscellany of conveyances and horseflesh. The respectable inhabitants</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1927"></td>
        <td id="LC1927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the place, men in golf and boating costumes, wives prettily dressed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1928"></td>
        <td id="LC1928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were packing, river-side loafers energetically helping, children</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1929"></td>
        <td id="LC1929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excited, and, for the most part, highly delighted at this astonishing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1930"></td>
        <td id="LC1930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">variation of their Sunday experiences. In the midst of it all the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1931"></td>
        <td id="LC1931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worthy vicar was very pluckily holding an early celebration, and his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1932"></td>
        <td id="LC1932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bell was jangling out above the excitement.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1933"></td>
        <td id="LC1933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1934"></td>
        <td id="LC1934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I and the artilleryman, seated on the step of the drinking fountain,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1935"></td>
        <td id="LC1935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made a very passable meal upon what we had brought with us. Patrols of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1936"></td>
        <td id="LC1936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">soldiers—here no longer hussars, but grenadiers in white—were warning</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1937"></td>
        <td id="LC1937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people to move now or to take refuge in their cellars as soon as the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1938"></td>
        <td id="LC1938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">firing began. We saw as we crossed the railway bridge that a growing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1939"></td>
        <td id="LC1939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crowd of people had assembled in and about the railway station, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1940"></td>
        <td id="LC1940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swarming platform was piled with boxes and packages. The ordinary</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1941"></td>
        <td id="LC1941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">traffic had been stopped, I believe, in order to allow of the passage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1942"></td>
        <td id="LC1942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of troops and guns to Chertsey, and I have heard since that a savage</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1943"></td>
        <td id="LC1943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggle occurred for places in the special trains that were put on at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1944"></td>
        <td id="LC1944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a later hour.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1945"></td>
        <td id="LC1945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1946"></td>
        <td id="LC1946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We remained at Weybridge until midday, and at that hour we found</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1947"></td>
        <td id="LC1947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves at the place near Shepperton Lock where the Wey and Thames</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1948"></td>
        <td id="LC1948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">join. Part of the time we spent helping two old women to pack a little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1949"></td>
        <td id="LC1949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cart. The Wey has a treble mouth, and at this point boats are to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1950"></td>
        <td id="LC1950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hired, and there was a ferry across the river. On the Shepperton side</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1951"></td>
        <td id="LC1951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was an inn with a lawn, and beyond that the tower of Shepperton</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1952"></td>
        <td id="LC1952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Church—it has been replaced by a spire—rose above the trees.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1953"></td>
        <td id="LC1953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1954"></td>
        <td id="LC1954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here we found an excited and noisy crowd of fugitives. As yet the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1955"></td>
        <td id="LC1955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flight had not grown to a panic, but there were already far more people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1956"></td>
        <td id="LC1956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">than all the boats going to and fro could enable to cross. People came</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1957"></td>
        <td id="LC1957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">panting along under heavy burdens; one husband and wife were even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1958"></td>
        <td id="LC1958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">carrying a small outhouse door between them, with some of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1959"></td>
        <td id="LC1959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">household goods piled thereon. One man told us he meant to try to get</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1960"></td>
        <td id="LC1960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away from Shepperton station.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1961"></td>
        <td id="LC1961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1962"></td>
        <td id="LC1962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a lot of shouting, and one man was even jesting. The idea</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1963"></td>
        <td id="LC1963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people seemed to have here was that the Martians were simply formidable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1964"></td>
        <td id="LC1964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human beings, who might attack and sack the town, to be certainly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1965"></td>
        <td id="LC1965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroyed in the end. Every now and then people would glance nervously</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1966"></td>
        <td id="LC1966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across the Wey, at the meadows towards Chertsey, but everything over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1967"></td>
        <td id="LC1967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there was still.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1968"></td>
        <td id="LC1968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1969"></td>
        <td id="LC1969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Across the Thames, except just where the boats landed, everything was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1970"></td>
        <td id="LC1970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet, in vivid contrast with the Surrey side. The people who landed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1971"></td>
        <td id="LC1971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there from the boats went tramping off down the lane. The big ferryboat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1972"></td>
        <td id="LC1972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had just made a journey. Three or four soldiers stood on the lawn of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1973"></td>
        <td id="LC1973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the inn, staring and jesting at the fugitives, without offering to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1974"></td>
        <td id="LC1974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">help. The inn was closed, as it was now within prohibited hours.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1975"></td>
        <td id="LC1975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1976"></td>
        <td id="LC1976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What’s that?” cried a boatman, and “Shut up, you fool!” said a man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1977"></td>
        <td id="LC1977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">near me to a yelping dog. Then the sound came again, this time from the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1978"></td>
        <td id="LC1978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">direction of Chertsey, a muffled thud—the sound of a gun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1979"></td>
        <td id="LC1979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1980"></td>
        <td id="LC1980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fighting was beginning. Almost immediately unseen batteries across</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1981"></td>
        <td id="LC1981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the river to our right, unseen because of the trees, took up the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1982"></td>
        <td id="LC1982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chorus, firing heavily one after the other. A woman screamed. Everyone</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1983"></td>
        <td id="LC1983" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stood arrested by the sudden stir of battle, near us and yet invisible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1984"></td>
        <td id="LC1984" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to us. Nothing was to be seen save flat meadows, cows feeding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1985"></td>
        <td id="LC1985" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unconcernedly for the most part, and silvery pollard willows motionless</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1986" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1986"></td>
        <td id="LC1986" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the warm sunlight.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1987"></td>
        <td id="LC1987" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1988" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1988"></td>
        <td id="LC1988" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“The sojers’ll stop ’em,” said a woman beside me, doubtfully. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1989" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1989"></td>
        <td id="LC1989" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">haziness rose over the treetops.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L1990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="1990"></td>
        <td id="LC1990" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>

        <td id="LC2084" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">above the seething and roar of the Martian’s collapse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2085" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2085"></td>
        <td id="LC2085" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2086" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2086"></td>
        <td id="LC2086" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For a moment I heeded nothing of the heat, forgot the patent need of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2087" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2087"></td>
        <td id="LC2087" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">self-preservation. I splashed through the tumultuous water, pushing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2088" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2088"></td>
        <td id="LC2088" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">aside a man in black to do so, until I could see round the bend. Half a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2089" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2089"></td>
        <td id="LC2089" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dozen deserted boats pitched aimlessly upon the confusion of the waves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2090" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2090"></td>
        <td id="LC2090" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fallen Martian came into sight downstream, lying across the river,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2091" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2091"></td>
        <td id="LC2091" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and for the most part submerged.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2092" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2092"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2093" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2093"></td>
        <td id="LC2093" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Thick clouds of steam were pouring off the wreckage, and through the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2094" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2094"></td>
        <td id="LC2094" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tumultuously whirling wisps I could see, intermittently and vaguely,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2095" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2095"></td>
        <td id="LC2095" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gigantic limbs churning the water and flinging a splash and spray</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2096" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2096"></td>
        <td id="LC2096" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of mud and froth into the air. The tentacles swayed and struck like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2097" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2097"></td>
        <td id="LC2097" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">living arms, and, save for the helpless purposelessness of these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2098" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2098"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2099" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2099"></td>
        <td id="LC2099" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amid the waves. Enormous quantities of a ruddy-brown fluid were</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2100" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2100"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2101" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2101"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2102"></td>
        <td id="LC2102" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My attention was diverted from this death flurry by a furious yelling,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2103"></td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC2104" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">man, knee-deep near the towing path, shouted inaudibly to me and</td>

        <td id="L2105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2105"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2106"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2107"></td>
        <td id="LC2107" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shepperton guns spoke this time unavailingly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2108"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2109"></td>
        <td id="LC2109" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At that I ducked at once under water, and, holding my breath until</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2110"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L2113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2113"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2114"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2120"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2121"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2123"></td>
        <td id="LC2123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heat-Rays waved high, and the hissing beams smote down this way and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC2124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that.</td>

        <td id="L2125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2125"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2126"></td>
        <td id="LC2126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The air was full of sound, a deafening and confusing conflict of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">noises—the clangorous din of the Martians, the crash of falling houses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2128"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2131"></td>
        <td id="LC2131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Weybridge its impact was marked by flashes of incandescent white, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2132"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2135"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2136"></td>
        <td id="LC2136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For a moment perhaps I stood there, breast-high in the almost boiling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L2142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2142"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2143"></td>
        <td id="LC2143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then suddenly the white flashes of the Heat-Ray came leaping towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2144"></td>
        <td id="LC2144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me. The houses caved in as they dissolved at its touch, and darted out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flames; the trees changed to fire with a roar. The Ray flickered up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC2146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down the towing path, licking off the people who ran this way and that,</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2147"></td>
        <td id="LC2147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and came down to the water’s edge not fifty yards from where I stood.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2148"></td>
        <td id="LC2148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It swept across the river to Shepperton, and the water in its track</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2149"></td>
        <td id="LC2149" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose in a boiling weal crested with steam. I turned shoreward.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2150"></td>
        <td id="LC2150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2151"></td>
        <td id="LC2151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In another moment the huge wave, well-nigh at the boiling-point had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2152"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2153"></td>
        <td id="LC2153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I staggered through the leaping, hissing water towards the shore. Had</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2154"></td>
        <td id="LC2154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my foot stumbled, it would have been the end. I fell helplessly, in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2155"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2158"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2159"></td>
        <td id="LC2159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I have a dim memory of the foot of a Martian coming down within a score</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2160"></td>

        <td id="L2167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2167"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2168"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2169"></td>
        <td id="LC2169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">XIII.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2170"></td>
        <td id="LC2170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2171"></td>
        <td id="LC2171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">HOW I FELL IN WITH THE CURATE.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2172"></td>
        <td id="LC2172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2173"></td>
        <td id="LC2173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After getting this sudden lesson in the power of terrestrial weapons,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2174"></td>
        <td id="LC2174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Martians retreated to their original position upon Horsell Common;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2175"></td>
        <td id="LC2175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and in their haste, and encumbered with the debris of their smashed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2176"></td>
        <td id="LC2176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">companion, they no doubt overlooked many such a stray and negligible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2177"></td>
        <td id="LC2177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">victim as myself. Had they left their comrade and pushed on forthwith,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2178"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2180"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2184"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2270"></td>
        <td id="LC2270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smoke. His face was a fair weakness, his chin retreated, and his hair</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2271"></td>
        <td id="LC2271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lay in crisp, almost flaxen curls on his low forehead; his eyes were</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2272"></td>
        <td id="LC2272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rather large, pale blue, and blankly staring. He spoke abruptly,</td>

        <td id="L2273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2273"></td>
        <td id="LC2273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">looking vacantly away from me.</td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2276"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2277"></td>
        <td id="LC2277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stared at him and made no answer.</td>

</td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2362"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2364"></td>
        <td id="LC2364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2365"></td>
        <td id="LC2365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I told him it was the heliograph signalling—that it was the sign of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2366"></td>
        <td id="LC2366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human help and effort in the sky.</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2461"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L2740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2740"></td>

        <td id="L2741" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2741"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L2832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2832"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2833"></td>
        <td id="LC2833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flashed into fire, and only one or two of the men who were already</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2834"></td>
        <td id="LC2834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">running over the crest of the hill escaped.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2835"></td>
        <td id="LC2835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2836"></td>
        <td id="LC2836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">After this it would seem that the three took counsel together and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2837"></td>
        <td id="LC2837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">halted, and the scouts who were watching them report that they remained</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2838"></td>
        <td id="LC2838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolutely stationary for the next half hour. The Martian who had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2839"></td>
        <td id="LC2839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">overthrown crawled tediously out of his hood, a small brown figure,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2840"></td>
        <td id="LC2840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">oddly suggestive from that distance of a speck of blight, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2841"></td>
        <td id="LC2841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">apparently engaged in the repair of his support. About nine he had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2842"></td>
        <td id="LC2842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">finished, for his cowl was then seen above the trees again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2843"></td>
        <td id="LC2843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2844"></td>
        <td id="LC2844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was a few minutes past nine that night when these three sentinels</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2845"></td>
        <td id="LC2845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were joined by four other Martians, each carrying a thick black tube. A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2846"></td>
        <td id="LC2846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">similar tube was handed to each of the three, and the seven proceeded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2847"></td>
        <td id="LC2847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to distribute themselves at equal distances along a curved line between</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2848"></td>
        <td id="LC2848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">St. George’s Hill, Weybridge, and the village of Send, southwest of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2849"></td>
        <td id="LC2849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Ripley.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2850"></td>
        <td id="LC2850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2851"></td>
        <td id="LC2851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A dozen rockets sprang out of the hills before them so soon as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2852"></td>
        <td id="LC2852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">began to move, and warned the waiting batteries about Ditton and Esher.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2853"></td>
        <td id="LC2853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the same time four of their fighting machines, similarly armed with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2854"></td>
        <td id="LC2854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tubes, crossed the river, and two of them, black against the western</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2855"></td>
        <td id="LC2855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sky, came into sight of myself and the curate as we hurried wearily and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2856"></td>
        <td id="LC2856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">painfully along the road that runs northward out of Halliford. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2857"></td>
        <td id="LC2857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">moved, as it seemed to us, upon a cloud, for a milky mist covered the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2858"></td>
        <td id="LC2858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fields and rose to a third of their height.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2859"></td>
        <td id="LC2859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2860"></td>
        <td id="LC2860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At this sight the curate cried faintly in his throat, and began</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2861"></td>
        <td id="LC2861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">running; but I knew it was no good running from a Martian, and I turned</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2862"></td>

        <td id="L2863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2863"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L2865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2865"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2866"></td>
        <td id="LC2866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The two halted, the nearer to us standing and facing Sunbury, the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L2867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2867"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L2869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2869"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2870"></td>
        <td id="LC2870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The occasional howling of the Martians had ceased; they took up their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2871"></td>
        <td id="LC2871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">positions in the huge crescent about their cylinders in absolute</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2872"></td>
        <td id="LC2872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence. It was a crescent with twelve miles between its horns. Never</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2873"></td>
        <td id="LC2873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">since the devising of gunpowder was the beginning of a battle so still.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2874"></td>
        <td id="LC2874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">To us and to an observer about Ripley it would have had precisely the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2875"></td>
        <td id="LC2875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">same effect—the Martians seemed in solitary possession of the darkling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2876"></td>
        <td id="LC2876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">night, lit only as it was by the slender moon, the stars, the afterglow</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2877"></td>
        <td id="LC2877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the daylight, and the ruddy glare from St. George’s Hill and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2878"></td>
        <td id="LC2878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">woods of Painshill.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2879"></td>
