</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2880"></td>
        <td id="LC2880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But facing that crescent everywhere—at Staines, Hounslow, Ditton,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2881"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2882"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2883"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2884"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2885"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2886"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2887"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2888"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2889"></td>
        <td id="LC2889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thunderous fury of battle.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2890"></td>
        <td id="LC2890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2891"></td>
        <td id="LC2891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">No doubt the thought that was uppermost in a thousand of those vigilant</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2892"></td>
        <td id="LC2892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">minds, even as it was uppermost in mine, was the riddle—how much they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2893"></td>
        <td id="LC2893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">understood of us. Did they grasp that we in our millions were</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2894"></td>
        <td id="LC2894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">organized, disciplined, working together? Or did they interpret our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2895"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2896"></td>
        <td id="LC2896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">investment of their encampment, as we should the furious unanimity of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2897"></td>
        <td id="LC2897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">onslaught in a disturbed hive of bees? Did they dream they might</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2898"></td>
        <td id="LC2898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exterminate us? (At that time no one knew what food they needed.) A</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2899"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2900"></td>
        <td id="LC2900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vast sentinel shape. And in the back of my mind was the sense of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2901"></td>
        <td id="LC2901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the huge unknown and hidden forces Londonward. Had they prepared</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2902"></td>
        <td id="LC2902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pitfalls? Were the powder mills at Hounslow ready as a snare? Would the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2903"></td>
        <td id="LC2903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Londoners have the heart and courage to make a greater Moscow of their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2904"></td>
        <td id="LC2904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mighty province of houses?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2905"></td>
        <td id="LC2905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2906"></td>
        <td id="LC2906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then, after an interminable time, as it seemed to us, crouching and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2907"></td>
        <td id="LC2907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">peering through the hedge, came a sound like the distant concussion of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2908"></td>
        <td id="LC2908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a gun. Another nearer, and then another. And then the Martian beside us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2909"></td>
        <td id="LC2909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">raised his tube on high and discharged it, gunwise, with a heavy report</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2910"></td>
        <td id="LC2910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that made the ground heave. The one towards Staines answered him. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2911"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2912"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2913"></td>
        <td id="LC2913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was so excited by these heavy minute-guns following one another that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2914"></td>
        <td id="LC2914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I so far forgot my personal safety and my scalded hands as to clamber</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2915"></td>
        <td id="LC2915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">up into the hedge and stare towards Sunbury. As I did so a second</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2916"></td>
        <td id="LC2916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">report followed, and a big projectile hurtled overhead towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2917"></td>
        <td id="LC2917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hounslow. I expected at least to see smoke or fire, or some such</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2918"></td>
        <td id="LC2918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidence of its work. But all I saw was the deep blue sky above, with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2919"></td>
        <td id="LC2919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">one solitary star, and the white mist spreading wide and low beneath.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2920"></td>
        <td id="LC2920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And there had been no crash, no answering explosion. The silence was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2921"></td>
        <td id="LC2921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restored; the minute lengthened to three.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2922"></td>
        <td id="LC2922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2923"></td>
        <td id="LC2923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What has happened?” said the curate, standing up beside me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2924"></td>
        <td id="LC2924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2925"></td>
        <td id="LC2925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Heaven knows!” said I.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2926"></td>
        <td id="LC2926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L2927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="2927"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3112"></td>
        <td id="LC3112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">swarm of vehicles, and had the luck to be foremost in the sack of a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3113"></td>
        <td id="LC3113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cycle shop. The front tire of the machine he got was punctured in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3114"></td>
        <td id="LC3114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dragging it through the window, but he got up and off, notwithstanding,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3115"></td>
        <td id="LC3115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with no further injury than a cut wrist. The steep foot of Haverstock</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3116"></td>
        <td id="LC3116" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hill was impassable owing to several overturned horses, and my brother</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3117" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3117"></td>
        <td id="LC3117" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struck into Belsize Road.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3118" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3118"></td>
        <td id="LC3118" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3119" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3119"></td>
        <td id="LC3119" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So he got out of the fury of the panic, and, skirting the Edgware Road,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3120" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3120"></td>
        <td id="LC3120" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reached Edgware about seven, fasting and wearied, but well ahead of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3121"></td>
        <td id="LC3121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crowd. Along the road people were standing in the roadway, curious,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3122"></td>
        <td id="LC3122" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wondering. He was passed by a number of cyclists, some horsemen, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3123" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3123"></td>
        <td id="LC3123" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two motor cars. A mile from Edgware the rim of the wheel broke, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3124" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3124"></td>
        <td id="LC3124" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">machine became unridable. He left it by the roadside and trudged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3125" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3125"></td>
        <td id="LC3125" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the village. There were shops half opened in the main street of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3126" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3126"></td>
        <td id="LC3126" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the place, and people crowded on the pavement and in the doorways and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3127" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3127"></td>
        <td id="LC3127" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">windows, staring astonished at this extraordinary procession of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3128" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3128"></td>
        <td id="LC3128" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fugitives that was beginning. He succeeded in getting some food at an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3129" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3129"></td>
        <td id="LC3129" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">inn.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3130" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3130"></td>
        <td id="LC3130" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3131" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3131"></td>
        <td id="LC3131" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For a time he remained in Edgware not knowing what next to do. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3132" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3132"></td>
        <td id="LC3132" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flying people increased in number. Many of them, like my brother,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3133" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3133"></td>
        <td id="LC3133" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed inclined to loiter in the place. There was no fresh news of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3134" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3134"></td>
        <td id="LC3134" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">invaders from Mars.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3135" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3135"></td>
        <td id="LC3135" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3136" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3136"></td>
        <td id="LC3136" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At that time the road was crowded, but as yet far from congested. Most</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3137"></td>
        <td id="LC3137" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the fugitives at that hour were mounted on cycles, but there were</td>

        <td id="LC3139" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dust hung in heavy clouds along the road to St. Albans.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3140" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3140"></td>
        <td id="LC3140" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3141"></td>
        <td id="LC3141" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was perhaps a vague idea of making his way to Chelmsford, where some</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3142" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3142"></td>
        <td id="LC3142" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends of his lived, that at last induced my brother to strike into a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3143" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3143"></td>
        <td id="LC3143" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quiet lane running eastward. Presently he came upon a stile, and,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3144"></td>
        <td id="LC3144" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crossing it, followed a footpath northeastward. He passed near several</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3145"></td>
        <td id="LC3145" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farmhouses and some little places whose names he did not learn. He saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3146"></td>
        <td id="LC3146" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">few fugitives until, in a grass lane towards High Barnet, he happened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3147" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3147"></td>
        <td id="LC3147" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon two ladies who became his fellow travellers. He came upon them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3148"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3149" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3149"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3150" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3150"></td>
        <td id="LC3150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He heard their screams, and, hurrying round the corner, saw a couple of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3151"></td>
        <td id="LC3151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">men struggling to drag them out of the little pony-chaise in which they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3152"></td>
        <td id="LC3152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been driving, while a third with difficulty held the frightened</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3153"></td>
        <td id="LC3153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pony’s head. One of the ladies, a short woman dressed in white, was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3154"></td>
        <td id="LC3154" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simply screaming; the other, a dark, slender figure, slashed at the man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3155" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3155"></td>
        <td id="LC3155" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">who gripped her arm with a whip she held in her disengaged hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3156" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3156"></td>
        <td id="LC3156" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3157" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3157"></td>
        <td id="LC3157" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My brother immediately grasped the situation, shouted, and hurried</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3158" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3158"></td>
        <td id="LC3158" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards the struggle. One of the men desisted and turned towards him,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3159" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3159"></td>
        <td id="LC3159" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and my brother, realising from his antagonist’s face that a fight was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3160"></td>
        <td id="LC3160" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unavoidable, and being an expert boxer, went into him forthwith and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3161"></td>
        <td id="LC3161" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sent him down against the wheel of the chaise.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3162" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3162"></td>
        <td id="LC3162" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3163"></td>
        <td id="LC3163" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was no time for pugilistic chivalry and my brother laid him quiet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3164" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3164"></td>
        <td id="LC3164" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a kick, and gripped the collar of the man who pulled at the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3165" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3165"></td>
        <td id="LC3165" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slender lady’s arm. He heard the clatter of hoofs, the whip stung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3166" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3166"></td>
        <td id="LC3166" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across his face, a third antagonist struck him between the eyes, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3167" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3167"></td>
        <td id="LC3167" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the man he held wrenched himself free and made off down the lane in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3168"></td>
        <td id="LC3168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">direction from which he had come.</td>

        <td id="L3169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3169"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3170"></td>
        <td id="LC3170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Partly stunned, he found himself facing the man who had held the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3171"></td>
        <td id="LC3171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horse’s head, and became aware of the chaise receding from him down the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3172"></td>
        <td id="LC3172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lane, swaying from side to side, and with the women in it looking back.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3173"></td>
        <td id="LC3173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The man before him, a burly rough, tried to close, and he stopped him</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3174"></td>
        <td id="LC3174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with a blow in the face. Then, realising that he was deserted, he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3175"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3176"></td>
        <td id="LC3176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sturdy man close behind him, and the fugitive, who had turned now,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3177"></td>
        <td id="LC3177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">following remotely.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3178"></td>
        <td id="LC3178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3179"></td>
        <td id="LC3179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly he stumbled and fell; his immediate pursuer went headlong, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3180"></td>
        <td id="LC3180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">he rose to his feet to find himself with a couple of antagonists again.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3181"></td>
        <td id="LC3181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He would have had little chance against them had not the slender lady</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3182"></td>
        <td id="LC3182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">very pluckily pulled up and returned to his help. It seems she had had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3183"></td>
        <td id="LC3183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a revolver all this time, but it had been under the seat when she and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3184"></td>
        <td id="LC3184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">her companion were attacked. She fired at six yards’ distance, narrowly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3185"></td>
        <td id="LC3185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">missing my brother. The less courageous of the robbers made off, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3186"></td>
        <td id="LC3186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his companion followed him, cursing his cowardice. They both stopped in</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3187"></td>
        <td id="LC3187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight down the lane, where the third man lay insensible.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3188"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3189"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3190"></td>
        <td id="LC3190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">revolver.</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3194"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3195"></td>
        <td id="LC3195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">She turned without a word—they were both panting—and they went back to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3196"></td>
        <td id="LC3196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where the lady in white struggled to hold back the frightened pony.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3197"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3198"></td>
        <td id="LC3198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The robbers had evidently had enough of it. When my brother looked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3199"></td>
        <td id="LC3199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again they were retreating.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3200"></td>
        <td id="LC3200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3201"></td>
        <td id="LC3201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I’ll sit here,” said my brother, “if I may”; and he got upon the empty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3202"></td>
        <td id="LC3202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">front seat. The lady looked over her shoulder.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3203"></td>
        <td id="LC3203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3204"></td>
        <td id="LC3204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Give me the reins,” she said, and laid the whip along the pony’s side.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3205"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3298"></td>
        <td id="LC3298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3299"></td>
        <td id="LC3299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My brother stopped.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3300"></td>
        <td id="LC3300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3301"></td>
        <td id="LC3301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For the main road was a boiling stream of people, a torrent of human</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3302"></td>
        <td id="LC3302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beings rushing northward, one pressing on another. A great bank of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3303"></td>
        <td id="LC3303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dust, white and luminous in the blaze of the sun, made everything</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3304"></td>
        <td id="LC3304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within twenty feet of the ground grey and indistinct and was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3305"></td>
        <td id="LC3305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perpetually renewed by the hurrying feet of a dense crowd of horses and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3306"></td>
        <td id="LC3306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of men and women on foot, and by the wheels of vehicles of every</td>

        <td id="L3307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3307"></td>
        <td id="LC3307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">description.</td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3311"></td>

        <td id="LC3312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">point of the lane and road; the crowd roared like a fire, and the dust</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3313"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3317"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3320"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3321"></td>
        <td id="LC3321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So much as they could see of the road Londonward between the houses to</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3322"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">between the villas on either side; the black heads, the crowded forms,</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3331"></td>
        <td id="LC3331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pony’s head. Irresistibly attracted, he advanced slowly, pace by pace,</td>

        <td id="L3333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3333"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3334"></td>
        <td id="LC3334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Edgware had been a scene of confusion, Chalk Farm a riotous tumult, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3335"></td>
        <td id="LC3335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this was a whole population in movement. It is hard to imagine that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3336"></td>
        <td id="LC3336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">host. It had no character of its own. The figures poured out past the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3337"></td>
        <td id="LC3337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">corner, and receded with their backs to the group in the lane. Along</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3338"></td>
        <td id="LC3338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the margin came those who were on foot threatened by the wheels,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3339"></td>
        <td id="LC3339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stumbling in the ditches, blundering into one another.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3340"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3341"></td>
        <td id="LC3341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The carts and carriages crowded close upon one another, making little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3342"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3343"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3347"></td>
        <td id="LC3347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Push on!” was the cry. “Push on! They are coming!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3348"></td>
        <td id="LC3348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3349"></td>
        <td id="LC3349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In one cart stood a blind man in the uniform of the Salvation Army,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3350"></td>
        <td id="LC3350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gesticulating with his crooked fingers and bawling, “Eternity!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Eternity!” His voice was hoarse and very loud so that my brother could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3352"></td>
        <td id="LC3352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hear him long after he was lost to sight in the dust. Some of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3353"></td>
        <td id="LC3353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people who crowded in the carts whipped stupidly at their horses and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3354"></td>
        <td id="LC3354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quarrelled with other drivers; some sat motionless, staring at nothing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3355"></td>
        <td id="LC3355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with miserable eyes; some gnawed their hands with thirst, or lay</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3356"></td>

        <td id="LC3357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">covered with foam, their eyes bloodshot.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3358"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3359"></td>
        <td id="LC3359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There were cabs, carriages, shop-carts, waggons, beyond counting; a</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="LC3360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mail cart, a road-cleaner’s cart marked “Vestry of St. Pancras,” a huge</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3361"></td>

        <td id="L3362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3362"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3363"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3364"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3365"></td>
        <td id="LC3365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3366"></td>
        <td id="LC3366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Eter-nity! Eter-nity!” came echoing down the road.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3367"></td>
        <td id="LC3367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3368"></td>
        <td id="LC3368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There were sad, haggard women tramping by, well dressed, with children</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3369"></td>
        <td id="LC3369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that cried and stumbled, their dainty clothes smothered in dust, their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3370"></td>
        <td id="LC3370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weary faces smeared with tears. With many of these came men, sometimes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3371"></td>
        <td id="LC3371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">helpful, sometimes lowering and savage. Fighting side by side with them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3372"></td>
        <td id="LC3372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pushed some weary street outcast in faded black rags, wide-eyed,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3373"></td>
        <td id="LC3373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loud-voiced, and foul-mouthed. There were sturdy workmen thrusting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3374"></td>
        <td id="LC3374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their way along, wretched, unkempt men, clothed like clerks or shopmen,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3375"></td>
        <td id="LC3375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">struggling spasmodically; a wounded soldier my brother noticed, men</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3376"></td>
        <td id="LC3376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dressed in the clothes of railway porters, one wretched creature in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3377"></td>
        <td id="LC3377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">nightshirt with a coat thrown over it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3378"></td>
        <td id="LC3378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3379"></td>
        <td id="LC3379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But varied as its composition was, certain things all that host had in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3380"></td>
        <td id="LC3380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">common. There were fear and pain on their faces, and fear behind them.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3381"></td>
        <td id="LC3381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A tumult up the road, a quarrel for a place in a waggon, sent the whole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3382"></td>
        <td id="LC3382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">host of them quickening their pace; even a man so scared and broken</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3383"></td>
        <td id="LC3383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that his knees bent under him was galvanised for a moment into renewed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3384"></td>
        <td id="LC3384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">activity. The heat and dust had already been at work upon this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3385"></td>
        <td id="LC3385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">multitude. Their skins were dry, their lips black and cracked. They</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3386"></td>
        <td id="LC3386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were all thirsty, weary, and footsore. And amid the various cries one</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3387"></td>
        <td id="LC3387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">heard disputes, reproaches, groans of weariness and fatigue; the voices</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3388"></td>
        <td id="LC3388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of most of them were hoarse and weak. Through it all ran a refrain:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3389"></td>
        <td id="LC3389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3390"></td>
        <td id="LC3390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Way! Way! The Martians are coming!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3391"></td>
        <td id="LC3391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3392"></td>
        <td id="LC3392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Few stopped and came aside from that flood. The lane opened slantingly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3393"></td>
        <td id="LC3393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the main road with a narrow opening, and had a delusive appearance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3394"></td>
        <td id="LC3394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of coming from the direction of London. Yet a kind of eddy of people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3395"></td>
        <td id="LC3395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drove into its mouth; weaklings elbowed out of the stream, who for the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3396"></td>
        <td id="LC3396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">most part rested but a moment before plunging into it again. A little</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3397"></td>
        <td id="LC3397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way down the lane, with two friends bending over him, lay a man with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3398"></td>
        <td id="LC3398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bare leg, wrapped about with bloody rags. He was a lucky man to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3399"></td>
        <td id="LC3399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">friends.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3400"></td>
        <td id="LC3400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3401"></td>
        <td id="LC3401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A little old man, with a grey military moustache and a filthy black</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3402"></td>
        <td id="LC3402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">frock coat, limped out and sat down beside the trap, removed his</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3403"></td>
        <td id="LC3403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boot—his sock was blood-stained—shook out a pebble, and hobbled on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3404"></td>
        <td id="LC3404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">again; and then a little girl of eight or nine, all alone, threw</td>
      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3406"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3407"></td>
        <td id="LC3407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I can’t go on! I can’t go on!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3408"></td>
        <td id="LC3408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3409"></td>
        <td id="LC3409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">My brother woke from his torpor of astonishment and lifted her up,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3410"></td>
        <td id="LC3410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">speaking gently to her, and carried her to Miss Elphinstone. So soon as</td>

        <td id="LC3411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my brother touched her she became quite still, as if frightened.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3412"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3413"></td>
        <td id="LC3413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Ellen!” shrieked a woman in the crowd, with tears in her</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="L3426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3426"></td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3441"></td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L3448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3448"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3452"></td>
        <td id="LC3452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cartwheel shaved him narrowly.</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3453"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3454"></td>
        <td id="LC3454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Way!” cried the men all about him. “Make way!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3455"></td>
        <td id="LC3455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3456"></td>
        <td id="LC3456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">So soon as the cab had passed, he flung himself, with both hands open,</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3457"></td>
        <td id="LC3457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon the heap of coins, and began thrusting handfuls in his pocket. A</td>

</td>

        <td id="L3461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3461"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3462"></td>
        <td id="LC3462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to clutch the bit of the horse.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3463"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3464"></td>
        <td id="LC3464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Before he could get to it, he heard a scream under the wheels, and saw</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3465"></td>
        <td id="LC3465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through the dust the rim passing over the poor wretch’s back. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3466"></td>
        <td id="LC3466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">driver of the cart slashed his whip at my brother, who ran round behind</td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC3469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wheel had broken his back, and his lower limbs lay limp and dead. My</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3470"></td>
        <td id="LC3470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brother stood up and yelled at the next driver, and a man on a black</td>

        <td id="LC3471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horse came to his assistance.</td>

        <td id="L3472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3472"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3473"></td>

        <td id="L3475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3475"></td>
        <td id="LC3475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">clutched after his money, and regarded my brother fiercely, hammering</td>

        <td id="L3476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3476"></td>
        <td id="LC3476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at his arm with a handful of gold. “Go on! Go on!” shouted angry voices</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3477"></td>
        <td id="LC3477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">behind. “Way! Way!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3478"></td>
        <td id="LC3478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3479"></td>
        <td id="LC3479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a smash as the pole of a carriage crashed into the cart that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3480"></td>
        <td id="LC3480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the man on horseback stopped. My brother looked up, and the man with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3481"></td>
        <td id="LC3481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the gold twisted his head round and bit the wrist that held his collar.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3482"></td>
        <td id="LC3482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">There was a concussion, and the black horse came staggering sideways,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3483"></td>
        <td id="LC3483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the carthorse pushed beside it. A hoof missed my brother’s foot by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3484"></td>
        <td id="LC3484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a hair’s breadth. He released his grip on the fallen man and jumped</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3485"></td>
        <td id="LC3485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back. He saw anger change to terror on the face of the poor wretch on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3486"></td>

        <td id="L3551" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3551"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3552" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3552"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3553" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3553"></td>
        <td id="LC3553" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Had the Martians aimed only at destruction, they might on Monday have</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L3554" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3554"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3558" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3558"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3567" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3567"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3569" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3569"></td>
        <td id="LC3569" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">no disciplined march; it was a stampede—a stampede gigantic and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3570" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3570"></td>
        <td id="LC3570" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible—without order and without a goal, six million people unarmed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3571" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3571"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3572" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3572"></td>
        <td id="LC3572" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of civilisation, of the massacre of mankind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3573" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3573"></td>
        <td id="LC3573" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3574" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3574"></td>
        <td id="LC3574" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Directly below him the balloonist would have seen the network of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3575" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3575"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3576" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3576"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3577" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3577"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3578" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3578"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3579" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3579"></td>

        <td id="LC3671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sickle-shaped curve that vanished into mist at last towards the Naze.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3672"></td>
        <td id="LC3672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Close inshore was a multitude of fishing smacks—English, Scotch,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3673"></td>
        <td id="LC3673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">French, Dutch, and Swedish; steam launches from the Thames, yachts,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3674"></td>
        <td id="LC3674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">electric boats; and beyond were ships of larger burden, a multitude of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3675"></td>
        <td id="LC3675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filthy colliers, trim merchantmen, cattle ships, passenger boats,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3676"></td>
        <td id="LC3676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">petroleum tanks, ocean tramps, an old white transport even, neat white</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3677"></td>
        <td id="LC3677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and grey liners from Southampton and Hamburg; and along the blue coast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3678"></td>
        <td id="LC3678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">across the Blackwater my brother could make out dimly a dense swarm of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3679"></td>
        <td id="LC3679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">boats chaffering with the people on the beach, a swarm which also</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3680"></td>
        <td id="LC3680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">extended up the Blackwater almost to Maldon.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3681"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3682"></td>
        <td id="LC3682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">About a couple of miles out lay an ironclad, very low in the water,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3683"></td>
        <td id="LC3683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">almost, to my brother’s perception, like a water-logged ship. This was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3684"></td>
        <td id="LC3684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the ram _Thunder Child_. It was the only warship in sight, but far away</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3685"></td>
        <td id="LC3685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the right over the smooth surface of the sea—for that day there was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3686"></td>
        <td id="LC3686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a dead calm—lay a serpent of black smoke to mark the next ironclads of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3687"></td>
        <td id="LC3687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Channel Fleet, which hovered in an extended line, steam up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3688"></td>
        <td id="LC3688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ready for action, across the Thames estuary during the course of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3689"></td>
        <td id="LC3689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Martian conquest, vigilant and yet powerless to prevent it.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3690"></td>
        <td id="LC3690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3691"></td>
        <td id="LC3691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At the sight of the sea, Mrs. Elphinstone, in spite of the assurances</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3692"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3693"></td>
        <td id="LC3693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England before, she would rather die than trust herself friendless in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3694" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3694"></td>
        <td id="LC3694" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foreign country, and so forth. She seemed, poor woman, to imagine that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3695" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3695"></td>
        <td id="LC3695" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the French and the Martians might prove very similar. She had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3696" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3696"></td>
        <td id="LC3696" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">growing increasingly hysterical, fearful, and depressed during the two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3697" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3697"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3698" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3698"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3699"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3700"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3701"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3702" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3702"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3703" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3703"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3707"></td>
        <td id="LC3707" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was about two o’clock when my brother, having paid their fares at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3708"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3712" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3712"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3713" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3713"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3714" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3714"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3721" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3721"></td>
        <td id="LC3721" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Some of the passengers were of opinion that this firing came from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3722"></td>
        <td id="LC3722" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Shoeburyness, until it was noticed that it was growing louder. At the</td>
      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3729" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3729"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3730" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3730"></td>
        <td id="LC3730" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crescent of shipping, and the low Essex coast was growing blue and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3731" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3731"></td>
        <td id="LC3731" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hazy, when a Martian appeared, small and faint in the remote distance,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3732" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3732"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3733" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3733"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3739" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3739"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3740" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3740"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3742" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3742"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC3743" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. Then, far away beyond the Crouch, came another, striding over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3745" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3745"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3748" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3748"></td>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L3751" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3751"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3752" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3752"></td>
        <td id="LC3752" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Glancing northwestward, my brother saw the large crescent of shipping</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3753" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3753"></td>
        <td id="LC3753" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">already writhing with the approaching terror; one ship passing behind</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3754" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3754"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3755" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3755"></td>
        <td id="LC3755" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">whistling and giving off volumes of steam, sails being let out,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3756" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3756"></td>
        <td id="LC3756" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">launches rushing hither and thither. He was so fascinated by this and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3757" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3757"></td>
        <td id="LC3757" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">by the creeping danger away to the left that he had no eyes for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3758" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3758"></td>
        <td id="LC3758" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">anything seaward. And then a swift movement of the steamboat (she had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3759" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3759"></td>
        <td id="LC3759" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">suddenly come round to avoid being run down) flung him headlong from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3760" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3760"></td>
        <td id="LC3760" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the seat upon which he was standing. There was a shouting all about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3761" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3761"></td>
        <td id="LC3761" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him, a trampling of feet, and a cheer that seemed to be answered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3762" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3762"></td>
        <td id="LC3762" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">faintly. The steamboat lurched and rolled him over upon his hands.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3763" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3763"></td>
        <td id="LC3763" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3764" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3764"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3856"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3857"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L3950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3950"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3951"></td>
        <td id="LC3951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">powder made me think of what I had read of the destruction of Pompeii.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3952"></td>
        <td id="LC3952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We got to Hampton Court without misadventure, our minds full of strange</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3953"></td>
        <td id="LC3953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and unfamiliar appearances, and at Hampton Court our eyes were relieved</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3954"></td>
        <td id="LC3954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to find a patch of green that had escaped the suffocating drift. We</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3955"></td>
        <td id="LC3955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">went through Bushey Park, with its deer going to and fro under the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3956"></td>
        <td id="LC3956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">chestnuts, and some men and women hurrying in the distance towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3957"></td>
        <td id="LC3957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hampton, and so we came to Twickenham. These were the first people we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3958"></td>
        <td id="LC3958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3959"></td>
        <td id="LC3959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3960"></td>
        <td id="LC3960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Away across the road the woods beyond Ham and Petersham were still</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3961"></td>
        <td id="LC3961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">afire. Twickenham was uninjured by either Heat-Ray or Black Smoke, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3962"></td>
        <td id="LC3962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there were more people about here, though none could give us news. For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3963"></td>
        <td id="LC3963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the most part they were like ourselves, taking advantage of a lull to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3964"></td>
        <td id="LC3964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shift their quarters. I have an impression that many of the houses here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3965"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3966"></td>
        <td id="LC3966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">flight. Here too the evidence of a hasty rout was abundant along the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3967"></td>
        <td id="LC3967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road. I remember most vividly three smashed bicycles in a heap, pounded</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3968"></td>
        <td id="LC3968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the road by the wheels of subsequent carts. We crossed Richmond</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3969"></td>
        <td id="LC3969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Bridge about half past eight. We hurried across the exposed bridge, of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3970"></td>
        <td id="LC3970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course, but I noticed floating down the stream a number of red masses,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3971"></td>
        <td id="LC3971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">some many feet across. I did not know what these were—there was no time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3972"></td>
        <td id="LC3972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for scrutiny—and I put a more horrible interpretation on them than they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3973"></td>
        <td id="LC3973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">deserved. Here again on the Surrey side were black dust that had once</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3974"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3975"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3976"></td>
        <td id="LC3976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Barnes.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3977"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3978"></td>
        <td id="LC3978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We saw in the blackened distance a group of three people running down a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3984" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3984"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L3985" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3985"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3987" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3987"></td>

      <tr>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3990" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3990"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3991" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3991"></td>
        <td id="LC3991" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But my fixed idea of reaching Leatherhead would not let me rest, and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3992" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3992"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3993" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3993"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3995" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3995"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3996" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3996"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3997" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3997"></td>
        <td id="LC3997" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That second start was the most foolhardy thing I ever did. For it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L3998" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="3998"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
