      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4000" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4000"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4001" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4001"></td>
        <td id="LC4001" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Four or five little black figures hurried before it across the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4002" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4002"></td>
        <td id="LC4002" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">green-grey of the field, and in a moment it was evident this Martian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4003" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4003"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4008" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4008"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4009" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4009"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4010" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4010"></td>

        <td id="L4013" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4013"></td>
        <td id="LC4013" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scarce daring to whisper to each other until the stars were out.</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4014" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4014"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4015" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4015"></td>
        <td id="LC4015" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I suppose it was nearly eleven o’clock before we gathered courage to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4016" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4016"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4020" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4020"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4024" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4024"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4025" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4025"></td>
        <td id="LC4025" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sheen, it seemed, had escaped destruction, but the place was silent and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4026" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4026"></td>

        <td id="L4029" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4029"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4030" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4030"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4031" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4031"></td>
        <td id="LC4031" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The first house we entered, after a little difficulty with the window,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4032" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4032"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4034" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4034"></td>
        <td id="LC4034" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I took a hatchet, which promised to be useful in our next</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4035" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4035"></td>
        <td id="LC4035" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house-breaking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4036" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4036"></td>
        <td id="LC4036" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4037" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4037"></td>
        <td id="LC4037" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We then crossed to a place where the road turns towards Mortlake. Here</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4038" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4038"></td>
        <td id="LC4038" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there stood a white house within a walled garden, and in the pantry of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4039" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4039"></td>
        <td id="LC4039" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this domicile we found a store of food—two loaves of bread in a pan, an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4040" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4040"></td>
        <td id="LC4040" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uncooked steak, and the half of a ham. I give this catalogue so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4041" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4041"></td>
        <td id="LC4041" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">precisely because, as it happened, we were destined to subsist upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4042" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4042"></td>
        <td id="LC4042" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this store for the next fortnight. Bottled beer stood under a shelf,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4043" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4043"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4137" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4137"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4145" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4145"></td>

        <td id="L4160" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4160"></td>

        <td id="L4161" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4161"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4163" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4163"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4230"></td>
        <td id="LC4230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ended. He presented them as tilted, stiff tripods, without either</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4231"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4238"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4276"></td>

        <td id="L4318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4318"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4319"></td>
        <td id="LC4319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In three other points their physiology differed strangely from ours.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4320"></td>
        <td id="LC4320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Their organisms did not sleep, any more than the heart of man sleeps.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4321"></td>
        <td id="LC4321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Since they had no extensive muscular mechanism to recuperate, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4322"></td>
        <td id="LC4322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">periodical extinction was unknown to them. They had little or no sense</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4414"></td>
        <td id="LC4414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">been convinced of this in spite of strong preconceptions. Before the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4415"></td>
        <td id="LC4415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Martian invasion, as an occasional reader here or there may remember, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4416"></td>
        <td id="LC4416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had written with some little vehemence against the telepathic theory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4417"></td>
        <td id="LC4417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4418"></td>
        <td id="LC4418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Martians wore no clothing. Their conceptions of ornament and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4419"></td>
        <td id="LC4419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decorum were necessarily different from ours; and not only were they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4420"></td>
        <td id="LC4420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">evidently much less sensible of changes of temperature than we are, but</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4421"></td>
        <td id="LC4421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">changes of pressure do not seem to have affected their health at all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4422"></td>
        <td id="LC4422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seriously. Yet though they wore no clothing, it was in the other</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4423"></td>
        <td id="LC4423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">artificial additions to their bodily resources that their great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4424"></td>
        <td id="LC4424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">superiority over man lay. We men, with our bicycles and road-skates,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4425"></td>
        <td id="LC4425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our Lilienthal soaring-machines, our guns and sticks and so forth, are</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4426"></td>
        <td id="LC4426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just in the beginning of the evolution that the Martians have worked</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4427"></td>
        <td id="LC4427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out. They have become practically mere brains, wearing different bodies</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4428"></td>
        <td id="LC4428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">according to their needs just as men wear suits of clothes and take a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4429"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4430"></td>
        <td id="LC4430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">perhaps nothing is more wonderful to a man than the curious fact that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4431"></td>
        <td id="LC4431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what is the dominant feature of almost all human devices in mechanism</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4432"></td>
        <td id="LC4432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is absent—the _wheel_ is absent; among all the things they brought to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4433"></td>
        <td id="LC4433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">earth there is no trace or suggestion of their use of wheels. One would</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4434"></td>
        <td id="LC4434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have at least expected it in locomotion. And in this connection it is</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4435"></td>
        <td id="LC4435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curious to remark that even on this earth Nature has never hit upon the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4436"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4437"></td>

        <td id="L4438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4438"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4439"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4441"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4442"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC4444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">machines are in most cases actuated by a sort of sham musculature of</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4446"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4447"></td>
        <td id="LC4447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">electricity. In this way the curious parallelism to animal motions,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4448"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4450"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4455"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4456"></td>

        <td id="L4460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4460"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4462"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4464"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4470"></td>

</td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4476"></td>
        <td id="LC4476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE DAYS OF IMPRISONMENT.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4477"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4478"></td>
        <td id="LC4478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The arrival of a second fighting-machine drove us from our peephole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4479"></td>
        <td id="LC4479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into the scullery, for we feared that from his elevation the Martian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4480"></td>
        <td id="LC4480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">might see down upon us behind our barrier. At a later date we began to</td>

        <td id="L4481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4481"></td>
        <td id="LC4481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">feel less in danger of their eyes, for to an eye in the dazzle of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4482"></td>
        <td id="LC4482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sunlight outside our refuge must have been blank blackness, but at</td>

      <tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4486"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4490"></td>
        <td id="LC4490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the dread of making a noise, and strike each other, and thrust and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4491"></td>
        <td id="LC4491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">kick, within a few inches of exposure.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4492"></td>
        <td id="LC4492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4493"></td>
        <td id="LC4493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The fact is that we had absolutely incompatible dispositions and habits</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4494"></td>
        <td id="LC4494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of thought and action, and our danger and isolation only accentuated</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4495"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4496"></td>
        <td id="LC4496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">curate’s trick of helpless exclamation, his stupid rigidity of mind.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4497"></td>
        <td id="LC4497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">His endless muttering monologue vitiated every effort I made to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4498"></td>
        <td id="LC4498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out a line of action, and drove me at times, thus pent up and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4499"></td>
        <td id="LC4499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intensified, almost to the verge of craziness. He was as lacking in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4500"></td>
        <td id="LC4500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restraint as a silly woman. He would weep for hours together, and I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4501"></td>
        <td id="LC4501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">verily believe that to the very end this spoiled child of life thought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4502"></td>
        <td id="LC4502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his weak tears in some way efficacious. And I would sit in the darkness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4503"></td>
        <td id="LC4503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unable to keep my mind off him by reason of his importunities. He ate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4504"></td>
        <td id="LC4504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more than I did, and it was in vain I pointed out that our only chance</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4505"></td>
        <td id="LC4505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of life was to stop in the house until the Martians had done with their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4506"></td>
        <td id="LC4506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pit, that in that long patience a time might presently come when we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4507"></td>

        <td id="L4509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4509"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4510"></td>
        <td id="LC4510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As the days wore on, his utter carelessness of any consideration so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4511"></td>
        <td id="LC4511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">intensified our distress and danger that I had, much as I loathed doing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4517"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4598" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4598"></td>
        <td id="LC4598" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sustained and cheerful hooting from the Martians.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4599" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4599"></td>
        <td id="LC4599" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4600" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4600"></td>
        <td id="LC4600" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I slid down the rubbish, struggled to my feet, clapped my hands over my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4601" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4601"></td>
        <td id="LC4601" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ears, and bolted into the scullery. The curate, who had been crouching</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4602" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4602"></td>
        <td id="LC4602" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silently with his arms over his head, looked up as I passed, cried out</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4603" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4603"></td>
        <td id="LC4603" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quite loudly at my desertion of him, and came running after me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4604" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4604"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4605" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4605"></td>
        <td id="LC4605" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">That night, as we lurked in the scullery, balanced between our horror</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4606" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4606"></td>
        <td id="LC4606" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and the terrible fascination this peeping had, although I felt an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4607" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4607"></td>
        <td id="LC4607" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">urgent need of action I tried in vain to conceive some plan of escape;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4608" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4608"></td>
        <td id="LC4608" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but afterwards, during the second day, I was able to consider our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4609" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4609"></td>
        <td id="LC4609" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">position with great clearness. The curate, I found, was quite incapable</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4610"></td>
        <td id="LC4610" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of discussion; this new and culminating atrocity had robbed him of all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4611" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4611"></td>
        <td id="LC4611" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vestiges of reason or forethought. Practically he had already sunk to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4612"></td>
        <td id="LC4612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the level of an animal. But as the saying goes, I gripped myself with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4613"></td>
        <td id="LC4613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">both hands. It grew upon my mind, once I could face the facts, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4614"></td>
        <td id="LC4614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">terrible as our position was, there was as yet no justification for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4615"></td>
        <td id="LC4615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">absolute despair. Our chief chance lay in the possibility of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4616"></td>
        <td id="LC4616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Martians making the pit nothing more than a temporary encampment. Or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4617"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4618"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4619"></td>
        <td id="LC4619" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weighed very carefully the possibility of our digging a way out in a</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4620"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4621" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4621"></td>
        <td id="LC4621" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight of some sentinel fighting-machine seemed at first too great. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4622" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4622"></td>
        <td id="LC4622" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I should have had to do all the digging myself. The curate would</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC4623" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">certainly have failed me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4624"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4625"></td>
        <td id="LC4625" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was on the third day, if my memory serves me right, that I saw the</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L4626" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4626"></td>
        <td id="LC4626" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lad killed. It was the only occasion on which I actually saw the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4627" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4627"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4628" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4628"></td>
        <td id="LC4628" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the better part of a day. I went into the scullery, removed the door,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4629"></td>
        <td id="LC4629" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and spent some hours digging with my hatchet as silently as possible;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4630" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4630"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4631" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4631"></td>
        <td id="LC4631" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">collapsed noisily, and I did not dare continue. I lost heart, and lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4632" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4632"></td>
        <td id="LC4632" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down on the scullery floor for a long time, having no spirit even to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4633"></td>
        <td id="LC4633" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">move. And after that I abandoned altogether the idea of escaping by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4634" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4634"></td>
        <td id="LC4634" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">excavation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4635" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4635"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4636" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4636"></td>
        <td id="LC4636" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It says much for the impression the Martians had made upon me that at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4637" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4637"></td>
        <td id="LC4637" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">first I entertained little or no hope of our escape being brought about</td>

        <td id="L4638" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4638"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4640" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4640"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4641" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4641"></td>
        <td id="LC4641" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was very late in the night, and the moon was shining brightly. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4642" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4642"></td>
        <td id="LC4642" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Martians had taken away the excavating-machine, and, save for a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4643" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4643"></td>
        <td id="LC4643" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fighting-machine that stood in the remoter bank of the pit and a</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L4645" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4645"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4646" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4646"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L4647" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4647"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4648" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4648"></td>
        <td id="LC4648" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the handling-machine, quite still. That night was a beautiful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4649" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4649"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4650" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4650"></td>
        <td id="LC4650" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">herself. I heard a dog howling, and that familiar sound it was that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4651" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4651"></td>
        <td id="LC4651" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">made me listen. Then I heard quite distinctly a booming exactly like</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4652" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4652"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

        <td id="LC4653" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">long interval six again. And that was all.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4654" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4654"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4655" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4655"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4656" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4656"></td>
        <td id="LC4656" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">VI.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4657" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4657"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4658" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4658"></td>
        <td id="LC4658" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE DEATH OF THE CURATE.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4659" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4659"></td>
        <td id="LC4659" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4660" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4660"></td>
        <td id="LC4660" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It was on the sixth day of our imprisonment that I peeped for the last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4661" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4661"></td>
        <td id="LC4661" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">time, and presently found myself alone. Instead of keeping close to me</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4662" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4662"></td>
        <td id="LC4662" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and trying to oust me from the slit, the curate had gone back into the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4663" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4663"></td>
        <td id="LC4663" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">scullery. I was struck by a sudden thought. I went back quickly and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4664" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4664"></td>
        <td id="LC4664" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">quietly into the scullery. In the darkness I heard the curate drinking.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4665" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4665"></td>
        <td id="LC4665" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I snatched in the darkness, and my fingers caught a bottle of burgundy.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4666" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4666"></td>
        <td id="LC4666" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4667" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4667"></td>
        <td id="LC4667" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For a few minutes there was a tussle. The bottle struck the floor and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4668" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4668"></td>
        <td id="LC4668" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">broke, and I desisted and rose. We stood panting and threatening each</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4669" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4669"></td>
        <td id="LC4669" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">other. In the end I planted myself between him and the food, and told</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4670" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4670"></td>
        <td id="LC4670" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">him of my determination to begin a discipline. I divided the food in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4671" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4671"></td>
        <td id="LC4671" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the pantry, into rations to last us ten days. I would not let him eat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4672" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4672"></td>
        <td id="LC4672" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">any more that day. In the afternoon he made a feeble effort to get at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4673" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4673"></td>
        <td id="LC4673" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the food. I had been dozing, but in an instant I was awake. All day and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4674" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4674"></td>
        <td id="LC4674" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all night we sat face to face, I weary but resolute, and he weeping and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4675" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4675"></td>
        <td id="LC4675" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">complaining of his immediate hunger. It was, I know, a night and a day,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4676" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4676"></td>
        <td id="LC4676" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">but to me it seemed—it seems now—an interminable length of time.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4677" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4677"></td>
        <td id="LC4677" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4678" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4678"></td>
        <td id="LC4678" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And so our widened incompatibility ended at last in open conflict. For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4679" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4679"></td>
        <td id="LC4679" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">two vast days we struggled in undertones and wrestling contests. There</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4680" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4680"></td>
        <td id="LC4680" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were times when I beat and kicked him madly, times when I cajoled and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4681" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4681"></td>
        <td id="LC4681" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">persuaded him, and once I tried to bribe him with the last bottle of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4682" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4682"></td>
        <td id="LC4682" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">burgundy, for there was a rain-water pump from which I could get water.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4683" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4683"></td>
        <td id="LC4683" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But neither force nor kindness availed; he was indeed beyond reason. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4684"></td>
        <td id="LC4684" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">would neither desist from his attacks on the food nor from his noisy</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4685" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4685"></td>
        <td id="LC4685" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">babbling to himself. The rudimentary precautions to keep our</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4686" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4686"></td>
        <td id="LC4686" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imprisonment endurable he would not observe. Slowly I began to realise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4687" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4687"></td>
        <td id="LC4687" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the complete overthrow of his intelligence, to perceive that my sole</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4688" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4688"></td>
        <td id="LC4688" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">companion in this close and sickly darkness was a man insane.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4689" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4689"></td>
        <td id="LC4689" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4690" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4690"></td>
        <td id="LC4690" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">From certain vague memories I am inclined to think my own mind wandered</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L4691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4691"></td>
        <td id="LC4691" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">at times. I had strange and hideous dreams whenever I slept. It sounds</td>

        <td id="L4693" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4693"></td>
        <td id="LC4693" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of the curate warned me, braced me, and kept me a sane man.</td>

</td>

      <tr>

        <td id="L4699" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4699"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>

</td>

        <td id="L4782" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="4782"></td>
        <td id="LC4782" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Then the faint metallic jingle returned. I traced it slowly feeling</td>
      </tr>

</td>

        <td id="L5046" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5046"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5049" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5049"></td>

</td>

</td>

        <td id="L5057" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5057"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5058" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5058"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5059" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5059"></td>
        <td id="LC5059" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">THE MAN ON PUTNEY HILL.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5060" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5060"></td>
        <td id="LC5060" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5061" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5061"></td>
        <td id="LC5061" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I spent that night in the inn that stands at the top of Putney Hill,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5062" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5062"></td>
        <td id="LC5062" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sleeping in a made bed for the first time since my flight to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5063" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5063"></td>
        <td id="LC5063" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Leatherhead. I will not tell the needless trouble I had breaking into</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5064" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5064"></td>
        <td id="LC5064" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that house—afterwards I found the front door was on the latch—nor how I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5065" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5065"></td>
        <td id="LC5065" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ransacked every room for food, until just on the verge of despair, in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5066" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5066"></td>
        <td id="LC5066" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">what seemed to me to be a servant’s bedroom, I found a rat-gnawed crust</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5067" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5067"></td>
        <td id="LC5067" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and two tins of pineapple. The place had been already searched and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5068" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5068"></td>
        <td id="LC5068" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">emptied. In the bar I afterwards found some biscuits and sandwiches</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5069" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5069"></td>
        <td id="LC5069" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that had been overlooked. The latter I could not eat, they were too</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5070" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5070"></td>
        <td id="LC5070" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rotten, but the former not only stayed my hunger, but filled my</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5071" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5071"></td>
        <td id="LC5071" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pockets. I lit no lamps, fearing some Martian might come beating that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5072" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5072"></td>
        <td id="LC5072" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">part of London for food in the night. Before I went to bed I had an</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5073" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5073"></td>
        <td id="LC5073" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">interval of restlessness, and prowled from window to window, peering</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5074" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5074"></td>
        <td id="LC5074" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out for some sign of these monsters. I slept little. As I lay in bed I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5075" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5075"></td>
        <td id="LC5075" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">found myself thinking consecutively—a thing I do not remember to have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5076" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5076"></td>

        <td id="L5081" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5081"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5082" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5082"></td>
        <td id="LC5082" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Three things struggled for possession of my mind: the killing of the</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5102" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5102"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5103" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5103"></td>
        <td id="LC5103" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And when, by an effort, I had set aside that picture of a prostrate</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5104" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5104"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5105" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5105"></td>
        <td id="LC5105" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the former I had no data; I could imagine a hundred things, and so,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5106" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5106"></td>
        <td id="LC5106" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">unhappily, I could for the latter. And suddenly that night became</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5107" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5107"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5108" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5108"></td>

        <td id="L5109" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5109"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5110" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5110"></td>
        <td id="LC5110" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Leatherhead I had not prayed. I had uttered prayers, fetish prayers,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5111" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5111"></td>
        <td id="LC5111" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had prayed as heathens mutter charms when I was in extremity; but now I</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5112" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5112"></td>
        <td id="LC5112" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">prayed indeed, pleading steadfastly and sanely, face to face with the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5113" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5113"></td>
        <td id="LC5113" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkness of God. Strange night! Strangest in this, that so soon as dawn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5114" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5114"></td>
        <td id="LC5114" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had come, I, who had talked with God, crept out of the house like a rat</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5115" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5115"></td>
        <td id="LC5115" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">leaving its hiding place—a creature scarcely larger, an inferior</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5116" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5116"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5121" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5121"></td>
        <td id="LC5121" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The morning was bright and fine, and the eastern sky glowed pink, and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5122" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5122"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5141" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5141"></td>

        <td id="L5144" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5144"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5146" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5146"></td>

      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5148" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5148"></td>
        <td id="LC5148" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stood regarding this. I made a step towards it, and it rose up and</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="LC5150" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silent and motionless, regarding me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5151" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5151"></td>
        <td id="LC5151" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5152" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5152"></td>
        <td id="LC5152" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">As I drew nearer I perceived he was dressed in clothes as dusty and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5153" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5153"></td>
        <td id="LC5153" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">filthy as my own; he looked, indeed, as though he had been dragged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5154" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5154"></td>

</td>
