        <td id="L5248" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5248"></td>
        <td id="LC5248" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Suddenly I recalled the night in the observatory.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5249" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5249"></td>
        <td id="LC5249" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5250" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5250"></td>
        <td id="LC5250" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“After the tenth shot they fired no more—at least, until the first</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5251" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5251"></td>
        <td id="LC5251" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cylinder came.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5252" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5252"></td>
        <td id="LC5252" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5253" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5253"></td>
        <td id="LC5253" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“How do you know?” said the artilleryman. I explained. He thought.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5254" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5254"></td>
        <td id="LC5254" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Something wrong with the gun,” he said. “But what if there is? They’ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5255" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5255"></td>
        <td id="LC5255" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get it right again. And even if there’s a delay, how can it alter the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5256" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5256"></td>
        <td id="LC5256" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">end? It’s just men and ants. There’s the ants builds their cities, live</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5257" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5257"></td>
        <td id="LC5257" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their lives, have wars, revolutions, until the men want them out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5258" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5258"></td>
        <td id="LC5258" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">way, and then they go out of the way. That’s what we are now—just ants.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5259" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5259"></td>
        <td id="LC5259" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Only——”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5260" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5260"></td>
        <td id="LC5260" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5261" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5261"></td>
        <td id="LC5261" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Yes,” I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5262" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5262"></td>
        <td id="LC5262" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5263" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5263"></td>
        <td id="LC5263" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We’re eatable ants.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5264" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5264"></td>
        <td id="LC5264" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5265" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5265"></td>
        <td id="LC5265" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">We sat looking at each other.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5266" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5266"></td>
        <td id="LC5266" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5267" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5267"></td>
        <td id="LC5267" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“And what will they do with us?” I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5268" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5268"></td>
        <td id="LC5268" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5269" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5269"></td>
        <td id="LC5269" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“That’s what I’ve been thinking,” he said; “that’s what I’ve been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5270" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5270"></td>
        <td id="LC5270" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thinking. After Weybridge I went south—thinking. I saw what was up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5271" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5271"></td>
        <td id="LC5271" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Most of the people were hard at it squealing and exciting themselves.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5272" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5272"></td>
        <td id="LC5272" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">But I’m not so fond of squealing. I’ve been in sight of death once or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5273" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5273"></td>
        <td id="LC5273" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">twice; I’m not an ornamental soldier, and at the best and worst,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5274" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5274"></td>
        <td id="LC5274" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">death—it’s just death. And it’s the man that keeps on thinking comes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5275" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5275"></td>
        <td id="LC5275" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">through. I saw everyone tracking away south. Says I, ‘Food won’t last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5276" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5276"></td>
        <td id="LC5276" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this way,’ and I turned right back. I went for the Martians like a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5277" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5277"></td>
        <td id="LC5277" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sparrow goes for man. All round”—he waved a hand to the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5278" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5278"></td>
        <td id="LC5278" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">horizon—“they’re starving in heaps, bolting, treading on each other. .</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5279" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5279"></td>
        <td id="LC5279" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">. .”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5280" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5280"></td>
        <td id="LC5280" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5281" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5281"></td>
        <td id="LC5281" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He saw my face, and halted awkwardly.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5282" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5282"></td>
        <td id="LC5282" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5283" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5283"></td>
        <td id="LC5283" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No doubt lots who had money have gone away to France,” he said. He</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5284" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5284"></td>
        <td id="LC5284" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seemed to hesitate whether to apologise, met my eyes, and went on:</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5285" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5285"></td>
        <td id="LC5285" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There’s food all about here. Canned things in shops; wines, spirits,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5286" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5286"></td>
        <td id="LC5286" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mineral waters; and the water mains and drains are empty. Well, I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5287" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5287"></td>
        <td id="LC5287" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">telling you what I was thinking. ‘Here’s intelligent things,’ I said,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5288" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5288"></td>
        <td id="LC5288" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">‘and it seems they want us for food. First, they’ll smash us up—ships,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5289" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5289"></td>
        <td id="LC5289" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">machines, guns, cities, all the order and organisation. All that will</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5290" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5290"></td>
        <td id="LC5290" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">go. If we were the size of ants we might pull through. But we’re not.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5291" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5291"></td>
        <td id="LC5291" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It’s all too bulky to stop. That’s the first certainty.’ Eh?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5292" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5292"></td>
        <td id="LC5292" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5293" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5293"></td>
        <td id="LC5293" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I assented.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5294" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5294"></td>
        <td id="LC5294" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5295" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5295"></td>
        <td id="LC5295" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“It is; I’ve thought it out. Very well, then—next; at present we’re</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5296" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5296"></td>
        <td id="LC5296" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caught as we’re wanted. A Martian has only to go a few miles to get a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5297" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5297"></td>
        <td id="LC5297" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crowd on the run. And I saw one, one day, out by Wandsworth, picking</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5298" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5298"></td>
        <td id="LC5298" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses to pieces and routing among the wreckage. But they won’t keep on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5299" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5299"></td>
        <td id="LC5299" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">doing that. So soon as they’ve settled all our guns and ships, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5300" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5300"></td>
        <td id="LC5300" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">smashed our railways, and done all the things they are doing over</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5301" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5301"></td>
        <td id="LC5301" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there, they will begin catching us systematic, picking the best and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5302" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5302"></td>
        <td id="LC5302" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">storing us in cages and things. That’s what they will start doing in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5303" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5303"></td>
        <td id="LC5303" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bit. Lord! They haven’t begun on us yet. Don’t you see that?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5304" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5304"></td>
        <td id="LC5304" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5305" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5305"></td>
        <td id="LC5305" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not begun!” I exclaimed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5306" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5306"></td>
        <td id="LC5306" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5307" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5307"></td>
        <td id="LC5307" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Not begun. All that’s happened so far is through our not having the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5308" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5308"></td>
        <td id="LC5308" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sense to keep quiet—worrying them with guns and such foolery. And</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5309" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5309"></td>
        <td id="LC5309" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">losing our heads, and rushing off in crowds to where there wasn’t any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5310" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5310"></td>
        <td id="LC5310" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more safety than where we were. They don’t want to bother us yet.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5311" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5311"></td>
        <td id="LC5311" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They’re making their things—making all the things they couldn’t bring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5312" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5312"></td>
        <td id="LC5312" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with them, getting things ready for the rest of their people. Very</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5313" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5313"></td>
        <td id="LC5313" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">likely that’s why the cylinders have stopped for a bit, for fear of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5314" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5314"></td>
        <td id="LC5314" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hitting those who are here. And instead of our rushing about blind, on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5315" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5315"></td>
        <td id="LC5315" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the howl, or getting dynamite on the chance of busting them up, we’ve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5316" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5316"></td>
        <td id="LC5316" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">got to fix ourselves up according to the new state of affairs. That’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5317" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5317"></td>
        <td id="LC5317" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">how I figure it out. It isn’t quite according to what a man wants for</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5318" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5318"></td>
        <td id="LC5318" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his species, but it’s about what the facts point to. And that’s the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5319" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5319"></td>
        <td id="LC5319" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">principle I acted upon. Cities, nations, civilisation, progress—it’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5320" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5320"></td>
        <td id="LC5320" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all over. That game’s up. We’re beat.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5321" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5321"></td>
        <td id="LC5321" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5322" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5322"></td>
        <td id="LC5322" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“But if that is so, what is there to live for?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5323" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5323"></td>
        <td id="LC5323" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5324" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5324"></td>
        <td id="LC5324" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The artilleryman looked at me for a moment.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5325" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5325"></td>
        <td id="LC5325" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5326" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5326"></td>
        <td id="LC5326" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There won’t be any more blessed concerts for a million years or so;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5327" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5327"></td>
        <td id="LC5327" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">there won’t be any Royal Academy of Arts, and no nice little feeds at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5328" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5328"></td>
        <td id="LC5328" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">restaurants. If it’s amusement you’re after, I reckon the game is up.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5329" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5329"></td>
        <td id="LC5329" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">If you’ve got any drawing-room manners or a dislike to eating peas with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5330" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5330"></td>
        <td id="LC5330" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a knife or dropping aitches, you’d better chuck ’em away. They ain’t no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5331" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5331"></td>
        <td id="LC5331" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">further use.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5332" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5332"></td>
        <td id="LC5332" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5333" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5333"></td>
        <td id="LC5333" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You mean——”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5334" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5334"></td>
        <td id="LC5334" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5335" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5335"></td>
        <td id="LC5335" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I mean that men like me are going on living—for the sake of the breed.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5336" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5336"></td>
        <td id="LC5336" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I tell you, I’m grim set on living. And if I’m not mistaken, you’ll</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5337" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5337"></td>
        <td id="LC5337" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">show what insides _you’ve_ got, too, before long. We aren’t going to be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5338" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5338"></td>
        <td id="LC5338" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exterminated. And I don’t mean to be caught either, and tamed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5339" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5339"></td>
        <td id="LC5339" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fattened and bred like a thundering ox. Ugh! Fancy those brown</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5340" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5340"></td>
        <td id="LC5340" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">creepers!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5341" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5341"></td>
        <td id="LC5341" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5342" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5342"></td>
        <td id="LC5342" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“You don’t mean to say——”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5343" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5343"></td>
        <td id="LC5343" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5344" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5344"></td>
        <td id="LC5344" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“I do. I’m going on, under their feet. I’ve got it planned; I’ve</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5345" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5345"></td>
        <td id="LC5345" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thought it out. We men are beat. We don’t know enough. We’ve got to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5346" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5346"></td>
        <td id="LC5346" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learn before we’ve got a chance. And we’ve got to live and keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5347" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5347"></td>
        <td id="LC5347" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">independent while we learn. See! That’s what has to be done.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5348" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5348"></td>
        <td id="LC5348" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5349" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5349"></td>
        <td id="LC5349" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stared, astonished, and stirred profoundly by the man’s resolution.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5350" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5350"></td>
        <td id="LC5350" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5351" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5351"></td>
        <td id="LC5351" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Great God!” cried I. “But you are a man indeed!” And suddenly I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5352" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5352"></td>
        <td id="LC5352" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gripped his hand.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5353" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5353"></td>
        <td id="LC5353" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5354" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5354"></td>
        <td id="LC5354" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Eh!” he said, with his eyes shining. “I’ve thought it out, eh?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5355" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5355"></td>
        <td id="LC5355" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5356" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5356"></td>
        <td id="LC5356" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Go on,” I said.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5357" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5357"></td>
        <td id="LC5357" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5358" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5358"></td>
        <td id="LC5358" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, those who mean to escape their catching must get ready. I’m</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5359" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5359"></td>
        <td id="LC5359" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">getting ready. Mind you, it isn’t all of us that are made for wild</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5360" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5360"></td>
        <td id="LC5360" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">beasts; and that’s what it’s got to be. That’s why I watched you. I had</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5361" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5361"></td>
        <td id="LC5361" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my doubts. You’re slender. I didn’t know that it was you, you see, or</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5362" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5362"></td>
        <td id="LC5362" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just how you’d been buried. All these—the sort of people that lived in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5363" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5363"></td>
        <td id="LC5363" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these houses, and all those damn little clerks that used to live down</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5364" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5364"></td>
        <td id="LC5364" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">_that_ way—they’d be no good. They haven’t any spirit in them—no proud</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5365" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5365"></td>
        <td id="LC5365" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dreams and no proud lusts; and a man who hasn’t one or the other—Lord!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5366" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5366"></td>
        <td id="LC5366" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">What is he but funk and precautions? They just used to skedaddle off to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5367" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5367"></td>
        <td id="LC5367" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">work—I’ve seen hundreds of ’em, bit of breakfast in hand, running wild</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5368" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5368"></td>
        <td id="LC5368" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and shining to catch their little season-ticket train, for fear they’d</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5369" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5369"></td>
        <td id="LC5369" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">get dismissed if they didn’t; working at businesses they were afraid to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5370" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5370"></td>
        <td id="LC5370" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">take the trouble to understand; skedaddling back for fear they wouldn’t</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5371" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5371"></td>
        <td id="LC5371" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">be in time for dinner; keeping indoors after dinner for fear of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5372" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5372"></td>
        <td id="LC5372" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">back streets, and sleeping with the wives they married, not because</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5373" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5373"></td>
        <td id="LC5373" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they wanted them, but because they had a bit of money that would make</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5374" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5374"></td>
        <td id="LC5374" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for safety in their one little miserable skedaddle through the world.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5375" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5375"></td>
        <td id="LC5375" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Lives insured and a bit invested for fear of accidents. And on</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5376" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5376"></td>
        <td id="LC5376" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Sundays—fear of the hereafter. As if hell was built for rabbits! Well,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5377" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5377"></td>
        <td id="LC5377" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the Martians will just be a godsend to these. Nice roomy cages,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5378" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5378"></td>
        <td id="LC5378" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fattening food, careful breeding, no worry. After a week or so chasing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5379" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5379"></td>
        <td id="LC5379" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">about the fields and lands on empty stomachs, they’ll come and be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5380" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5380"></td>
        <td id="LC5380" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">caught cheerful. They’ll be quite glad after a bit. They’ll wonder what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5381" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5381"></td>
        <td id="LC5381" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">people did before there were Martians to take care of them. And the bar</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5382" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5382"></td>
        <td id="LC5382" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">loafers, and mashers, and singers—I can imagine them. I can imagine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5383" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5383"></td>
        <td id="LC5383" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them,” he said, with a sort of sombre gratification. “There’ll be any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5384" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5384"></td>
        <td id="LC5384" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">amount of sentiment and religion loose among them. There’s hundreds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5385" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5385"></td>
        <td id="LC5385" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things I saw with my eyes that I’ve only begun to see clearly these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5386" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5386"></td>
        <td id="LC5386" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">last few days. There’s lots will take things as they are—fat and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5387" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5387"></td>
        <td id="LC5387" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stupid; and lots will be worried by a sort of feeling that it’s all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5388" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5388"></td>
        <td id="LC5388" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wrong, and that they ought to be doing something. Now whenever things</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5389" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5389"></td>
        <td id="LC5389" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are so that a lot of people feel they ought to be doing something, the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5390" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5390"></td>
        <td id="LC5390" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">weak, and those who go weak with a lot of complicated thinking, always</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5391" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5391"></td>
        <td id="LC5391" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">make for a sort of do-nothing religion, very pious and superior, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5392" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5392"></td>
        <td id="LC5392" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">submit to persecution and the will of the Lord. Very likely you’ve seen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5393" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5393"></td>
        <td id="LC5393" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the same thing. It’s energy in a gale of funk, and turned clean inside</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5394" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5394"></td>
        <td id="LC5394" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out. These cages will be full of psalms and hymns and piety. And those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5395" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5395"></td>
        <td id="LC5395" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of a less simple sort will work in a bit of—what is it?—eroticism.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5396" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5396"></td>
        <td id="LC5396" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5397" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5397"></td>
        <td id="LC5397" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He paused.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5398" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5398"></td>
        <td id="LC5398" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5399" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5399"></td>
        <td id="LC5399" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Very likely these Martians will make pets of some of them; train them</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5400" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5400"></td>
        <td id="LC5400" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to do tricks—who knows?—get sentimental over the pet boy who grew up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5401" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5401"></td>
        <td id="LC5401" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and had to be killed. And some, maybe, they will train to hunt us.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5402" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5402"></td>
        <td id="LC5402" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5403" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5403"></td>
        <td id="LC5403" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“No,” I cried, “that’s impossible! No human being——”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5404" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5404"></td>
        <td id="LC5404" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5405" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5405"></td>
        <td id="LC5405" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What’s the good of going on with such lies?” said the artilleryman.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5406" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5406"></td>
        <td id="LC5406" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“There’s men who’d do it cheerful. What nonsense to pretend there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5407" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5407"></td>
        <td id="LC5407" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">isn’t!”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5408" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5408"></td>
        <td id="LC5408" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5409" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5409"></td>
        <td id="LC5409" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And I succumbed to his conviction.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5410" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5410"></td>
        <td id="LC5410" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5411" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5411"></td>
        <td id="LC5411" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“If they come after me,” he said; “Lord, if they come after me!” and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5412" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5412"></td>
        <td id="LC5412" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">subsided into a grim meditation.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5413" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5413"></td>
        <td id="LC5413" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5414" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5414"></td>
        <td id="LC5414" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I sat contemplating these things. I could find nothing to bring against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5415" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5415"></td>
        <td id="LC5415" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this man’s reasoning. In the days before the invasion no one would have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5416" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5416"></td>
        <td id="LC5416" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">questioned my intellectual superiority to his—I, a professed and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5417" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5417"></td>
        <td id="LC5417" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">recognised writer on philosophical themes, and he, a common soldier;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5418" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5418"></td>
        <td id="LC5418" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and yet he had already formulated a situation that I had scarcely</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5419" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5419"></td>
        <td id="LC5419" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">realised.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5420" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5420"></td>
        <td id="LC5420" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5421" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5421"></td>
        <td id="LC5421" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“What are you doing?” I said presently. “What plans have you made?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5422" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5422"></td>
        <td id="LC5422" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5423" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5423"></td>
        <td id="LC5423" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He hesitated.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5424" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5424"></td>
        <td id="LC5424" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5425" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5425"></td>
        <td id="LC5425" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well, it’s like this,” he said. “What have we to do? We have to invent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5426" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5426"></td>
        <td id="LC5426" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a sort of life where men can live and breed, and be sufficiently secure</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5427" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5427"></td>
        <td id="LC5427" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to bring the children up. Yes—wait a bit, and I’ll make it clearer what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5428" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5428"></td>
        <td id="LC5428" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I think ought to be done. The tame ones will go like all tame beasts;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5429" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5429"></td>
        <td id="LC5429" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in a few generations they’ll be big, beautiful, rich-blooded,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5430" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5430"></td>
        <td id="LC5430" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stupid—rubbish! The risk is that we who keep wild will go</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5431" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5431"></td>
        <td id="LC5431" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">savage—degenerate into a sort of big, savage rat. . . . You see, how I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5432" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5432"></td>
        <td id="LC5432" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mean to live is underground. I’ve been thinking about the drains. Of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5433" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5433"></td>
        <td id="LC5433" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">course those who don’t know drains think horrible things; but under</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5434" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5434"></td>
        <td id="LC5434" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this London are miles and miles—hundreds of miles—and a few days rain</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5435" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5435"></td>
        <td id="LC5435" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and London empty will leave them sweet and clean. The main drains are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5436" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5436"></td>
        <td id="LC5436" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">big enough and airy enough for anyone. Then there’s cellars, vaults,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5437" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5437"></td>
        <td id="LC5437" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stores, from which bolting passages may be made to the drains. And the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5438" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5438"></td>
        <td id="LC5438" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">railway tunnels and subways. Eh? You begin to see? And we form a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5439" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5439"></td>
        <td id="LC5439" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">band—able-bodied, clean-minded men. We’re not going to pick up any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5440" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5440"></td>
        <td id="LC5440" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rubbish that drifts in. Weaklings go out again.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5441" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5441"></td>
        <td id="LC5441" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5442" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5442"></td>
        <td id="LC5442" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“As you meant me to go?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5443" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5443"></td>
        <td id="LC5443" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5444" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5444"></td>
        <td id="LC5444" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Well—I parleyed, didn’t I?”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5445" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5445"></td>
        <td id="LC5445" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5446" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5446"></td>
        <td id="LC5446" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We won’t quarrel about that. Go on.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5447" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5447"></td>
        <td id="LC5447" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5448" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5448"></td>
        <td id="LC5448" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Those who stop obey orders. Able-bodied, clean-minded women we want</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5449" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5449"></td>
        <td id="LC5449" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">also—mothers and teachers. No lackadaisical ladies—no blasted rolling</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5450" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5450"></td>
        <td id="LC5450" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">eyes. We can’t have any weak or silly. Life is real again, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5451" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5451"></td>
        <td id="LC5451" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">useless and cumbersome and mischievous have to die. They ought to die.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5452" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5452"></td>
        <td id="LC5452" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They ought to be willing to die. It’s a sort of disloyalty, after all,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5453" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5453"></td>
        <td id="LC5453" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to live and taint the race. And they can’t be happy. Moreover, dying’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5454" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5454"></td>
        <td id="LC5454" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">none so dreadful; it’s the funking makes it bad. And in all those</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5455" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5455"></td>
        <td id="LC5455" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">places we shall gather. Our district will be London. And we may even be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5456" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5456"></td>
        <td id="LC5456" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">able to keep a watch, and run about in the open when the Martians keep</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5457" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5457"></td>
        <td id="LC5457" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">away. Play cricket, perhaps. That’s how we shall save the race. Eh?</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5458" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5458"></td>
        <td id="LC5458" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">It’s a possible thing? But saving the race is nothing in itself. As I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5459" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5459"></td>
        <td id="LC5459" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">say, that’s only being rats. It’s saving our knowledge and adding to it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5460" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5460"></td>
        <td id="LC5460" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">is the thing. There men like you come in. There’s books, there’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5461" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5461"></td>
        <td id="LC5461" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">models. We must make great safe places down deep, and get all the books</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5462" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5462"></td>
        <td id="LC5462" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we can; not novels and poetry swipes, but ideas, science books. That’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5463" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5463"></td>
        <td id="LC5463" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">where men like you come in. We must go to the British Museum and pick</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5464" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5464"></td>
        <td id="LC5464" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all those books through. Especially we must keep up our science—learn</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5465" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5465"></td>
        <td id="LC5465" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">more. We must watch these Martians. Some of us must go as spies. When</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5466" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5466"></td>
        <td id="LC5466" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it’s all working, perhaps I will. Get caught, I mean. And the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5467" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5467"></td>
        <td id="LC5467" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thing is, we must leave the Martians alone. We mustn’t even steal. If</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5468" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5468"></td>
        <td id="LC5468" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">we get in their way, we clear out. We must show them we mean no harm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5469" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5469"></td>
        <td id="LC5469" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Yes, I know. But they’re intelligent things, and they won’t hunt us</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5470" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5470"></td>
        <td id="LC5470" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down if they have all they want, and think we’re just harmless vermin.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5471" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5471"></td>
        <td id="LC5471" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5472" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5472"></td>
        <td id="LC5472" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The artilleryman paused and laid a brown hand upon my arm.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5473" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5473"></td>
        <td id="LC5473" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5474" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5474"></td>
        <td id="LC5474" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“After all, it may not be so much we may have to learn before—Just</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5475" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5475"></td>
        <td id="LC5475" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imagine this: four or five of their fighting machines suddenly starting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5476" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5476"></td>
        <td id="LC5476" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">off—Heat-Rays right and left, and not a Martian in ’em. Not a Martian</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5477" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5477"></td>
        <td id="LC5477" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in ’em, but men—men who have learned the way how. It may be in my time,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5478" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5478"></td>
        <td id="LC5478" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even—those men. Fancy having one of them lovely things, with its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5479" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5479"></td>
        <td id="LC5479" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Heat-Ray wide and free! Fancy having it in control! What would it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5480" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5480"></td>
        <td id="LC5480" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">matter if you smashed to smithereens at the end of the run, after a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5481" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5481"></td>
        <td id="LC5481" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bust like that? I reckon the Martians’ll open their beautiful eyes!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5482" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5482"></td>
        <td id="LC5482" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Can’t you see them, man? Can’t you see them hurrying, hurrying—puffing</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5483" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5483"></td>
        <td id="LC5483" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and blowing and hooting to their other mechanical affairs? Something</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5484" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5484"></td>
        <td id="LC5484" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">out of gear in every case. And swish, bang, rattle, swish! Just as they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5485" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5485"></td>
        <td id="LC5485" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">are fumbling over it, _swish_ comes the Heat-Ray, and, behold! man has</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5486" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5486"></td>
        <td id="LC5486" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">come back to his own.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5487" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5487"></td>
        <td id="LC5487" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5488" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5488"></td>
        <td id="LC5488" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For a while the imaginative daring of the artilleryman, and the tone of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5489" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5489"></td>
        <td id="LC5489" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">assurance and courage he assumed, completely dominated my mind. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5490" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5490"></td>
        <td id="LC5490" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed unhesitatingly both in his forecast of human destiny and in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5491" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5491"></td>
        <td id="LC5491" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the practicability of his astonishing scheme, and the reader who thinks</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5492" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5492"></td>
        <td id="LC5492" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me susceptible and foolish must contrast his position, reading steadily</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5493" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5493"></td>
        <td id="LC5493" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with all his thoughts about his subject, and mine, crouching fearfully</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5494" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5494"></td>
        <td id="LC5494" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in the bushes and listening, distracted by apprehension. We talked in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5495" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5495"></td>
        <td id="LC5495" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this manner through the early morning time, and later crept out of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5496" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5496"></td>
        <td id="LC5496" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">bushes, and, after scanning the sky for Martians, hurried precipitately</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5497" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5497"></td>
        <td id="LC5497" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to the house on Putney Hill where he had made his lair. It was the coal</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5498" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5498"></td>
        <td id="LC5498" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cellar of the place, and when I saw the work he had spent a week</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5499" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5499"></td>
        <td id="LC5499" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon—it was a burrow scarcely ten yards long, which he designed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5500" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5500"></td>
        <td id="LC5500" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reach to the main drain on Putney Hill—I had my first inkling of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5501" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5501"></td>
        <td id="LC5501" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gulf between his dreams and his powers. Such a hole I could have dug in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5502" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5502"></td>
        <td id="LC5502" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a day. But I believed in him sufficiently to work with him all that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5503" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5503"></td>
        <td id="LC5503" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">morning until past midday at his digging. We had a garden barrow and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5504" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5504"></td>
        <td id="LC5504" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shot the earth we removed against the kitchen range. We refreshed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5505" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5505"></td>
        <td id="LC5505" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ourselves with a tin of mock-turtle soup and wine from the neighbouring</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5506" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5506"></td>
        <td id="LC5506" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pantry. I found a curious relief from the aching strangeness of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5507" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5507"></td>
        <td id="LC5507" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">world in this steady labour. As we worked, I turned his project over in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5508" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5508"></td>
        <td id="LC5508" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">my mind, and presently objections and doubts began to arise; but I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5509" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5509"></td>
        <td id="LC5509" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">worked there all the morning, so glad was I to find myself with a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5510" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5510"></td>
        <td id="LC5510" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">purpose again. After working an hour I began to speculate on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5511" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5511"></td>
        <td id="LC5511" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">distance one had to go before the cloaca was reached, the chances we</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5512" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5512"></td>
        <td id="LC5512" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had of missing it altogether. My immediate trouble was why we should</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5513" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5513"></td>
        <td id="LC5513" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dig this long tunnel, when it was possible to get into the drain at</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5514" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5514"></td>
        <td id="LC5514" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">once down one of the manholes, and work back to the house. It seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5515" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5515"></td>
        <td id="LC5515" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">me, too, that the house was inconveniently chosen, and required a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5516" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5516"></td>
        <td id="LC5516" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">needless length of tunnel. And just as I was beginning to face these</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5517" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5517"></td>
        <td id="LC5517" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things, the artilleryman stopped digging, and looked at me.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5518" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5518"></td>
        <td id="LC5518" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5519" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5519"></td>
        <td id="LC5519" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“We’re working well,” he said. He put down his spade. “Let us knock off</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5520" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5520"></td>
        <td id="LC5520" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a bit” he said. “I think it’s time we reconnoitred from the roof of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5521" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5521"></td>
        <td id="LC5521" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">house.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5522" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5522"></td>
        <td id="LC5522" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5523" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5523"></td>
        <td id="LC5523" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was for going on, and after a little hesitation he resumed his spade;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5524" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5524"></td>
        <td id="LC5524" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and then suddenly I was struck by a thought. I stopped, and so did he</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5525" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5525"></td>

        <td id="L5526" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5526"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5527" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5527"></td>
        <td id="LC5527" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Why were you walking about the common,” I said, “instead of being</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5529" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5529"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5530" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5530"></td>
        <td id="LC5530" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">“Taking the air,” he said. “I was coming back. It’s safer by night.”</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5531" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5531"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5532" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5532"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5534" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5534"></td>

        <td id="L5539" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5539"></td>

</td>

        <td id="L5584" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5584"></td>

</td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5592" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5592"></td>

        <td id="L5610" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5610"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5612" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5612"></td>
        <td id="LC5612" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">a speech of small variety and considerable intermittence. I took a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5613" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5613"></td>
        <td id="LC5613" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">cigar, and went upstairs to look at the lights of which he had spoken</td>
      </tr>

        <td id="L5614" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5614"></td>
        <td id="LC5614" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that blazed so greenly along the Highgate hills.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5615" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5615"></td>
        <td id="LC5615" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5616" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5616"></td>
        <td id="LC5616" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At first I stared unintelligently across the London valley. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5617" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5617"></td>
        <td id="LC5617" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">northern hills were shrouded in darkness; the fires near Kensington</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5618" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5618"></td>
        <td id="LC5618" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">glowed redly, and now and then an orange-red tongue of flame flashed up</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5619" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5619"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5620" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5620"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5624" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5624"></td>
        <td id="LC5624" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">dormant sense of wonder, my sense of the proportion of things, awoke</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5625" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5625"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5629" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5629"></td>

        <td id="L5633" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5633"></td>

</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5684" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5684"></td>

      </tr>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5691" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5691"></td>

        <td id="L5692" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5692"></td>

      </tr>

      </tr>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5700" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5700"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5701" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5701"></td>

      </tr>

        <td id="LC5705" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">History Museum and find my way up to the summits of the towers, in</td>
      </tr>

      </tr>

        <td id="L5707" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5707"></td>

      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5708" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5708"></td>
        <td id="LC5708" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All the large mansions on each side of the road were empty and still,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5709" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5709"></td>

</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5722" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5722"></td>

</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5797" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5797"></td>

        <td id="L5799" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5799"></td>
