      <tr>
        <td id="L5800" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5800"></td>
        <td id="LC5800" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">temerity. In front of me the road became pitchy black as though it was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5801" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5801"></td>
        <td id="LC5801" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">tarred, and I saw a contorted shape lying across the pathway. I could</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5802" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5802"></td>
        <td id="LC5802" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">not bring myself to go on. I turned down St. John’s Wood Road, and ran</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5803" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5803"></td>
        <td id="LC5803" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">headlong from this unendurable stillness towards Kilburn. I hid from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5804" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5804"></td>
        <td id="LC5804" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the night and the silence, until long after midnight, in a cabmen’s</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5805" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5805"></td>
        <td id="LC5805" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">shelter in Harrow Road. But before the dawn my courage returned, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5806" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5806"></td>
        <td id="LC5806" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">while the stars were still in the sky I turned once more towards</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5807" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5807"></td>
        <td id="LC5807" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Regent’s Park. I missed my way among the streets, and presently saw</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5808" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5808"></td>
        <td id="LC5808" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">down a long avenue, in the half-light of the early dawn, the curve of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5809" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5809"></td>
        <td id="LC5809" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Primrose Hill. On the summit, towering up to the fading stars, was a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5810" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5810"></td>
        <td id="LC5810" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">third Martian, erect and motionless like the others.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5811" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5811"></td>
        <td id="LC5811" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5812" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5812"></td>
        <td id="LC5812" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">An insane resolve possessed me. I would die and end it. And I would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5813" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5813"></td>
        <td id="LC5813" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">save myself even the trouble of killing myself. I marched on recklessly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5814" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5814"></td>
        <td id="LC5814" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards this Titan, and then, as I drew nearer and the light grew, I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5815" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5815"></td>
        <td id="LC5815" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">saw that a multitude of black birds was circling and clustering about</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5816" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5816"></td>
        <td id="LC5816" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the hood. At that my heart gave a bound, and I began running along the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5817" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5817"></td>
        <td id="LC5817" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">road.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5818" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5818"></td>
        <td id="LC5818" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5819" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5819"></td>
        <td id="LC5819" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I hurried through the red weed that choked St. Edmund’s Terrace (I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5820" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5820"></td>
        <td id="LC5820" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">waded breast-high across a torrent of water that was rushing down from</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5821" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5821"></td>
        <td id="LC5821" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the waterworks towards the Albert Road), and emerged upon the grass</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5822" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5822"></td>
        <td id="LC5822" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">before the rising of the sun. Great mounds had been heaped about the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5823" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5823"></td>
        <td id="LC5823" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crest of the hill, making a huge redoubt of it—it was the final and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5824" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5824"></td>
        <td id="LC5824" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">largest place the Martians had made—and from behind these heaps there</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5825" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5825"></td>
        <td id="LC5825" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose a thin smoke against the sky. Against the sky line an eager dog</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5826" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5826"></td>
        <td id="LC5826" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ran and disappeared. The thought that had flashed into my mind grew</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5827" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5827"></td>
        <td id="LC5827" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">real, grew credible. I felt no fear, only a wild, trembling exultation,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5828" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5828"></td>
        <td id="LC5828" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as I ran up the hill towards the motionless monster. Out of the hood</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5829" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5829"></td>
        <td id="LC5829" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">hung lank shreds of brown, at which the hungry birds pecked and tore.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5830" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5830"></td>
        <td id="LC5830" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5831" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5831"></td>
        <td id="LC5831" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">In another moment I had scrambled up the earthen rampart and stood upon</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5832" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5832"></td>
        <td id="LC5832" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">its crest, and the interior of the redoubt was below me. A mighty space</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5833" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5833"></td>
        <td id="LC5833" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it was, with gigantic machines here and there within it, huge mounds of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5834" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5834"></td>
        <td id="LC5834" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">material and strange shelter places. And scattered about it, some in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5835" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5835"></td>
        <td id="LC5835" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">their overturned war-machines, some in the now rigid handling-machines,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5836" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5836"></td>
        <td id="LC5836" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a dozen of them stark and silent and laid in a row, were the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5837" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5837"></td>
        <td id="LC5837" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Martians—_dead_!—slain by the putrefactive and disease bacteria against</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5838" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5838"></td>
        <td id="LC5838" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">which their systems were unprepared; slain as the red weed was being</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5839" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5839"></td>
        <td id="LC5839" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">slain; slain, after all man’s devices had failed, by the humblest</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5840" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5840"></td>
        <td id="LC5840" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">things that God, in his wisdom, has put upon this earth.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5841" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5841"></td>
        <td id="LC5841" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5842" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5842"></td>
        <td id="LC5842" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">For so it had come about, as indeed I and many men might have foreseen</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5843" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5843"></td>
        <td id="LC5843" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had not terror and disaster blinded our minds. These germs of disease</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5844" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5844"></td>
        <td id="LC5844" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">have taken toll of humanity since the beginning of things—taken toll of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5845" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5845"></td>
        <td id="LC5845" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">our prehuman ancestors since life began here. But by virtue of this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5846" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5846"></td>
        <td id="LC5846" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">natural selection of our kind we have developed resisting power; to no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5847" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5847"></td>
        <td id="LC5847" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">germs do we succumb without a struggle, and to many—those that cause</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5848" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5848"></td>
        <td id="LC5848" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">putrefaction in dead matter, for instance—our living frames are</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5849" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5849"></td>
        <td id="LC5849" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether immune. But there are no bacteria in Mars, and directly</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5850" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5850"></td>
        <td id="LC5850" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these invaders arrived, directly they drank and fed, our microscopic</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5851" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5851"></td>
        <td id="LC5851" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">allies began to work their overthrow. Already when I watched them they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5852" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5852"></td>
        <td id="LC5852" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">were irrevocably doomed, dying and rotting even as they went to and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5853" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5853"></td>
        <td id="LC5853" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">fro. It was inevitable. By the toll of a billion deaths man has bought</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5854" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5854"></td>
        <td id="LC5854" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">his birthright of the earth, and it is his against all comers; it would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5855" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5855"></td>
        <td id="LC5855" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">still be his were the Martians ten times as mighty as they are. For</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5856" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5856"></td>
        <td id="LC5856" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">neither do men live nor die in vain.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5857" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5857"></td>
        <td id="LC5857" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5858" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5858"></td>
        <td id="LC5858" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Here and there they were scattered, nearly fifty altogether, in that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5859" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5859"></td>
        <td id="LC5859" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great gulf they had made, overtaken by a death that must have seemed to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5860" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5860"></td>
        <td id="LC5860" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">them as incomprehensible as any death could be. To me also at that time</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5861" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5861"></td>
        <td id="LC5861" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">this death was incomprehensible. All I knew was that these things that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5862" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5862"></td>
        <td id="LC5862" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had been alive and so terrible to men were dead. For a moment I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5863" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5863"></td>
        <td id="LC5863" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">believed that the destruction of Sennacherib had been repeated, that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5864" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5864"></td>
        <td id="LC5864" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God had repented, that the Angel of Death had slain them in the night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5865" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5865"></td>
        <td id="LC5865" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5866" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5866"></td>
        <td id="LC5866" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I stood staring into the pit, and my heart lightened gloriously, even</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5867" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5867"></td>
        <td id="LC5867" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">as the rising sun struck the world to fire about me with his rays. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5868" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5868"></td>
        <td id="LC5868" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pit was still in darkness; the mighty engines, so great and wonderful</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5869" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5869"></td>
        <td id="LC5869" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in their power and complexity, so unearthly in their tortuous forms,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5870" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5870"></td>
        <td id="LC5870" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">rose weird and vague and strange out of the shadows towards the light.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5871" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5871"></td>
        <td id="LC5871" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">A multitude of dogs, I could hear, fought over the bodies that lay</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5872" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5872"></td>
        <td id="LC5872" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darkly in the depth of the pit, far below me. Across the pit on its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5873" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5873"></td>
        <td id="LC5873" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">farther lip, flat and vast and strange, lay the great flying-machine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5874" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5874"></td>
        <td id="LC5874" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with which they had been experimenting upon our denser atmosphere when</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5875" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5875"></td>
        <td id="LC5875" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decay and death arrested them. Death had come not a day too soon. At</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5876" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5876"></td>
        <td id="LC5876" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the sound of a cawing overhead I looked up at the huge fighting-machine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5877" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5877"></td>
        <td id="LC5877" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that would fight no more for ever, at the tattered red shreds of flesh</td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L5878" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5878"></td>
        <td id="LC5878" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that dripped down upon the overturned seats on the summit of Primrose</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5879" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5879"></td>
        <td id="LC5879" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Hill.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5880" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5880"></td>
        <td id="LC5880" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5881" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5881"></td>
        <td id="LC5881" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I turned and looked down the slope of the hill to where, enhaloed now</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5882" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5882"></td>
        <td id="LC5882" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">in birds, stood those other two Martians that I had seen overnight,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5883" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5883"></td>
        <td id="LC5883" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">just as death had overtaken them. The one had died, even as it had been</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5884" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5884"></td>
        <td id="LC5884" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">crying to its companions; perhaps it was the last to die, and its voice</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5885" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5885"></td>
        <td id="LC5885" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had gone on perpetually until the force of its machinery was exhausted.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5886" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5886"></td>
        <td id="LC5886" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">They glittered now, harmless tripod towers of shining metal, in the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5887" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5887"></td>
        <td id="LC5887" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">brightness of the rising sun.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5888" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5888"></td>
        <td id="LC5888" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5889" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5889"></td>
        <td id="LC5889" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">All about the pit, and saved as by a miracle from everlasting</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5890" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5890"></td>
        <td id="LC5890" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destruction, stretched the great Mother of Cities. Those who have only</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5891" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5891"></td>
        <td id="LC5891" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">seen London veiled in her sombre robes of smoke can scarcely imagine</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5892" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5892"></td>
        <td id="LC5892" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the naked clearness and beauty of the silent wilderness of houses.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5893" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5893"></td>
        <td id="LC5893" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5894" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5894"></td>
        <td id="LC5894" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Eastward, over the blackened ruins of the Albert Terrace and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5895" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5895"></td>
        <td id="LC5895" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">splintered spire of the church, the sun blazed dazzling in a clear sky,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5896" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5896"></td>
        <td id="LC5896" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and here and there some facet in the great wilderness of roofs caught</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5897" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5897"></td>
        <td id="LC5897" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the light and glared with a white intensity.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5898" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5898"></td>
        <td id="LC5898" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5899" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5899"></td>
        <td id="LC5899" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Northward were Kilburn and Hampsted, blue and crowded with houses;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5900" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5900"></td>
        <td id="LC5900" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">westward the great city was dimmed; and southward, beyond the Martians,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5901" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5901"></td>
        <td id="LC5901" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the green waves of Regent’s Park, the Langham Hotel, the dome of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5902" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5902"></td>
        <td id="LC5902" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Albert Hall, the Imperial Institute, and the giant mansions of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5903" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5903"></td>
        <td id="LC5903" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Brompton Road came out clear and little in the sunrise, the jagged</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5904" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5904"></td>
        <td id="LC5904" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">ruins of Westminster rising hazily beyond. Far away and blue were the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5905" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5905"></td>
        <td id="LC5905" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Surrey hills, and the towers of the Crystal Palace glittered like two</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5906" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5906"></td>
        <td id="LC5906" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silver rods. The dome of St. Paul’s was dark against the sunrise, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5907" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5907"></td>
        <td id="LC5907" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">injured, I saw for the first time, by a huge gaping cavity on its</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5908" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5908"></td>
        <td id="LC5908" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">western side.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5909" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5909"></td>
        <td id="LC5909" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5910" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5910"></td>
        <td id="LC5910" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And as I looked at this wide expanse of houses and factories and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5911" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5911"></td>
        <td id="LC5911" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">churches, silent and abandoned; as I thought of the multitudinous hopes</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5912" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5912"></td>
        <td id="LC5912" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and efforts, the innumerable hosts of lives that had gone to build this</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5913" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5913"></td>
        <td id="LC5913" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">human reef, and of the swift and ruthless destruction that had hung</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5914" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5914"></td>
        <td id="LC5914" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">over it all; when I realised that the shadow had been rolled back, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5915" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5915"></td>
        <td id="LC5915" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that men might still live in the streets, and this dear vast dead city</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5916" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5916"></td>
        <td id="LC5916" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of mine be once more alive and powerful, I felt a wave of emotion that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5917" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5917"></td>
        <td id="LC5917" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">was near akin to tears.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5918" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5918"></td>
        <td id="LC5918" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5919" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5919"></td>
        <td id="LC5919" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The torment was over. Even that day the healing would begin. The</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5920" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5920"></td>
        <td id="LC5920" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">survivors of the people scattered over the country—leaderless, lawless,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5921" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5921"></td>
        <td id="LC5921" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">foodless, like sheep without a shepherd—the thousands who had fled by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5922" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5922"></td>
        <td id="LC5922" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sea, would begin to return; the pulse of life, growing stronger and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5923" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5923"></td>
        <td id="LC5923" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">stronger, would beat again in the empty streets and pour across the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5924" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5924"></td>
        <td id="LC5924" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">vacant squares. Whatever destruction was done, the hand of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5925" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5925"></td>
        <td id="LC5925" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">destroyer was stayed. All the gaunt wrecks, the blackened skeletons of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5926" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5926"></td>
        <td id="LC5926" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">houses that stared so dismally at the sunlit grass of the hill, would</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5927" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5927"></td>
        <td id="LC5927" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">presently be echoing with the hammers of the restorers and ringing with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5928" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5928"></td>
        <td id="LC5928" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tapping of their trowels. At the thought I extended my hands</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5929" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5929"></td>
        <td id="LC5929" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">towards the sky and began thanking God. In a year, thought I—in a year.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5930" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5930"></td>
        <td id="LC5930" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">. . .</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5931" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5931"></td>
        <td id="LC5931" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5932" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5932"></td>
        <td id="LC5932" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">With overwhelming force came the thought of myself, of my wife, and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5933" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5933"></td>
        <td id="LC5933" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">old life of hope and tender helpfulness that had ceased for ever.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5934" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5934"></td>
        <td id="LC5934" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5935" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5935"></td>
        <td id="LC5935" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5936" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5936"></td>
        <td id="LC5936" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5937" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5937"></td>
        <td id="LC5937" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And now comes the strangest thing in my story. Yet, perhaps, it is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5938" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5938"></td>
        <td id="LC5938" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">altogether strange. I remember, clearly and coldly and vividly, all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5939" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5939"></td>
        <td id="LC5939" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I did that day until the time that I stood weeping and praising</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5940" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5940"></td>
        <td id="LC5940" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">God upon the summit of Primrose Hill. And then I forget.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5941" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5941"></td>
        <td id="LC5941" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5942" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5942"></td>
        <td id="LC5942" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Of the next three days I know nothing. I have learned since that, so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5943" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5943"></td>
        <td id="LC5943" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">far from my being the first discoverer of the Martian overthrow,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5944" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5944"></td>
        <td id="LC5944" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">several such wanderers as myself had already discovered this on the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5945" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5945"></td>
        <td id="LC5945" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">previous night. One man—the first—had gone to St. Martin’s-le-Grand,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5946" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5946"></td>
        <td id="LC5946" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and, while I sheltered in the cabmen’s hut, had contrived to telegraph</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5947" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5947"></td>
        <td id="LC5947" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to Paris. Thence the joyful news had flashed all over the world; a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5948" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5948"></td>
        <td id="LC5948" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">thousand cities, chilled by ghastly apprehensions, suddenly flashed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5949" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5949"></td>
        <td id="LC5949" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">into frantic illuminations; they knew of it in Dublin, Edinburgh,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5950" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5950"></td>
        <td id="LC5950" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Manchester, Birmingham, at the time when I stood upon the verge of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5951" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5951"></td>
        <td id="LC5951" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">pit. Already men, weeping with joy, as I have heard, shouting and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5952" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5952"></td>
        <td id="LC5952" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">staying their work to shake hands and shout, were making up trains,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5953" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5953"></td>
        <td id="LC5953" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">even as near as Crewe, to descend upon London. The church bells that</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5954" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5954"></td>
        <td id="LC5954" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had ceased a fortnight since suddenly caught the news, until all</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5955" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5955"></td>
        <td id="LC5955" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">England was bell-ringing. Men on cycles, lean-faced, unkempt, scorched</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5956" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5956"></td>
        <td id="LC5956" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">along every country lane shouting of unhoped deliverance, shouting to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5957" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5957"></td>
        <td id="LC5957" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">gaunt, staring figures of despair. And for the food! Across the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5958" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5958"></td>
        <td id="LC5958" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Channel, across the Irish Sea, across the Atlantic, corn, bread, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5959" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5959"></td>
        <td id="LC5959" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">meat were tearing to our relief. All the shipping in the world seemed</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5960" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5960"></td>
        <td id="LC5960" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">going Londonward in those days. But of all this I have no memory. I</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5961" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5961"></td>
        <td id="LC5961" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drifted—a demented man. I found myself in a house of kindly people, who</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5962" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5962"></td>
        <td id="LC5962" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had found me on the third day wandering, weeping, and raving through</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5963" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5963"></td>
        <td id="LC5963" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the streets of St. John’s Wood. They have told me since that I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5964" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5964"></td>
        <td id="LC5964" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">singing some insane doggerel about “The Last Man Left Alive! Hurrah!</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5965" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5965"></td>
        <td id="LC5965" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The Last Man Left Alive!” Troubled as they were with their own affairs,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5966" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5966"></td>
        <td id="LC5966" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">these people, whose name, much as I would like to express my gratitude</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5967" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5967"></td>
        <td id="LC5967" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to them, I may not even give here, nevertheless cumbered themselves</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5968" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5968"></td>
        <td id="LC5968" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">with me, sheltered me, and protected me from myself. Apparently they</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5969" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5969"></td>
        <td id="LC5969" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">had learned something of my story from me during the days of my lapse.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5970" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5970"></td>
        <td id="LC5970" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5971" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5971"></td>
        <td id="LC5971" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Very gently, when my mind was assured again, did they break to me what</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5972" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5972"></td>
        <td id="LC5972" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">they had learned of the fate of Leatherhead. Two days after I was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5973" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5973"></td>
        <td id="LC5973" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">imprisoned it had been destroyed, with every soul in it, by a Martian.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5974" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5974"></td>
        <td id="LC5974" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">He had swept it out of existence, as it seemed, without any</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5975" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5975"></td>
        <td id="LC5975" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">provocation, as a boy might crush an ant hill, in the mere wantonness</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5976" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5976"></td>
        <td id="LC5976" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">of power.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5977" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5977"></td>
        <td id="LC5977" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5978" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5978"></td>
        <td id="LC5978" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I was a lonely man, and they were very kind to me. I was a lonely man</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5979" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5979"></td>
        <td id="LC5979" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and a sad one, and they bore with me. I remained with them four days</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5980" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5980"></td>
        <td id="LC5980" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">after my recovery. All that time I felt a vague, a growing craving to</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5981" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5981"></td>
        <td id="LC5981" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">look once more on whatever remained of the little life that seemed so</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5982" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5982"></td>
        <td id="LC5982" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">happy and bright in my past. It was a mere hopeless desire to feast</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L5983" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="5983"></td>

      <tr>
        <td id="L6168" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6168"></td>
        <td id="LC6168" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">simultaneously a faint dark mark of a similar sinuous character was</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6169" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6169"></td>
        <td id="LC6169" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">detected upon a photograph of the Martian disk. One needs to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6170" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6170"></td>
        <td id="LC6170" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">drawings of these appearances in order to appreciate fully their</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6171" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6171"></td>
        <td id="LC6171" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remarkable resemblance in character.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6172" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6172"></td>
        <td id="LC6172" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6173" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6173"></td>
        <td id="LC6173" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">At any rate, whether we expect another invasion or not, our views of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6174" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6174"></td>
        <td id="LC6174" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the human future must be greatly modified by these events. We have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6175" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6175"></td>
        <td id="LC6175" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">learned now that we cannot regard this planet as being fenced in and a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6176" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6176"></td>
        <td id="LC6176" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">secure abiding place for Man; we can never anticipate the unseen good</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6177" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6177"></td>
        <td id="LC6177" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">or evil that may come upon us suddenly out of space. It may be that in</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6178" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6178"></td>
        <td id="LC6178" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the larger design of the universe this invasion from Mars is not</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6179" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6179"></td>
        <td id="LC6179" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">without its ultimate benefit for men; it has robbed us of that serene</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6180" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6180"></td>
        <td id="LC6180" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">confidence in the future which is the most fruitful source of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6181" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6181"></td>
        <td id="LC6181" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">decadence, the gifts to human science it has brought are enormous, and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6182" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6182"></td>
        <td id="LC6182" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">it has done much to promote the conception of the commonweal of</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6183" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6183"></td>
        <td id="LC6183" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mankind. It may be that across the immensity of space the Martians have</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6184" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6184"></td>
        <td id="LC6184" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">watched the fate of these pioneers of theirs and learned their lesson,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6185" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6185"></td>
        <td id="LC6185" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and that on the planet Venus they have found a securer settlement. Be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6186" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6186"></td>
        <td id="LC6186" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that as it may, for many years yet there will certainly be no</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6187" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6187"></td>
        <td id="LC6187" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">relaxation of the eager scrutiny of the Martian disk, and those fiery</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6188" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6188"></td>
        <td id="LC6188" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">darts of the sky, the shooting stars, will bring with them as they fall</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6189" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6189"></td>
        <td id="LC6189" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">an unavoidable apprehension to all the sons of men.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6190" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6190"></td>
        <td id="LC6190" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6191" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6191"></td>
        <td id="LC6191" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">The broadening of men’s views that has resulted can scarcely be</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6192" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6192"></td>
        <td id="LC6192" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">exaggerated. Before the cylinder fell there was a general persuasion</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6193" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6193"></td>
        <td id="LC6193" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that through all the deep of space no life existed beyond the petty</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6194" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6194"></td>
        <td id="LC6194" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">surface of our minute sphere. Now we see further. If the Martians can</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6195" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6195"></td>
        <td id="LC6195" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">reach Venus, there is no reason to suppose that the thing is impossible</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6196" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6196"></td>
        <td id="LC6196" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">for men, and when the slow cooling of the sun makes this earth</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6197" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6197"></td>
        <td id="LC6197" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uninhabitable, as at last it must do, it may be that the thread of life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6198" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6198"></td>
        <td id="LC6198" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that has begun here will have streamed out and caught our sister planet</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6199" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6199"></td>
        <td id="LC6199" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">within its toils.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6200" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6200"></td>
        <td id="LC6200" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6201" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6201"></td>
        <td id="LC6201" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Dim and wonderful is the vision I have conjured up in my mind of life</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6202" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6202"></td>
        <td id="LC6202" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">spreading slowly from this little seed bed of the solar system</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6203" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6203"></td>
        <td id="LC6203" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">throughout the inanimate vastness of sidereal space. But that is a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6204" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6204"></td>
        <td id="LC6204" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">remote dream. It may be, on the other hand, that the destruction of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6205" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6205"></td>
        <td id="LC6205" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Martians is only a reprieve. To them, and not to us, perhaps, is the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6206" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6206"></td>
        <td id="LC6206" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">future ordained.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6207" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6207"></td>
        <td id="LC6207" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6208" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6208"></td>
        <td id="LC6208" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I must confess the stress and danger of the time have left an abiding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6209" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6209"></td>
        <td id="LC6209" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sense of doubt and insecurity in my mind. I sit in my study writing by</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6210" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6210"></td>
        <td id="LC6210" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">lamplight, and suddenly I see again the healing valley below set with</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6211" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6211"></td>
        <td id="LC6211" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">writhing flames, and feel the house behind and about me empty and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6212" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6212"></td>
        <td id="LC6212" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">desolate. I go out into the Byfleet Road, and vehicles pass me, a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6213" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6213"></td>
        <td id="LC6213" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">butcher boy in a cart, a cabful of visitors, a workman on a bicycle,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6214" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6214"></td>
        <td id="LC6214" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">children going to school, and suddenly they become vague and unreal,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6215" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6215"></td>
        <td id="LC6215" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">and I hurry again with the artilleryman through the hot, brooding</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6216" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6216"></td>
        <td id="LC6216" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">silence. Of a night I see the black powder darkening the silent</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6217" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6217"></td>
        <td id="LC6217" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">streets, and the contorted bodies shrouded in that layer; they rise</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6218" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6218"></td>
        <td id="LC6218" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">upon me tattered and dog-bitten. They gibber and grow fiercer, paler,</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6219" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6219"></td>
        <td id="LC6219" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">uglier, mad distortions of humanity at last, and I wake, cold and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6220" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6220"></td>
        <td id="LC6220" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">wretched, in the darkness of the night.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6221" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6221"></td>
        <td id="LC6221" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6222" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6222"></td>
        <td id="LC6222" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I go to London and see the busy multitudes in Fleet Street and the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6223" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6223"></td>
        <td id="LC6223" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">Strand, and it comes across my mind that they are but the ghosts of the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6224" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6224"></td>
        <td id="LC6224" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">past, haunting the streets that I have seen silent and wretched, going</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6225" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6225"></td>
        <td id="LC6225" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">to and fro, phantasms in a dead city, the mockery of life in a</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6226" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6226"></td>
        <td id="LC6226" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">galvanised body. And strange, too, it is to stand on Primrose Hill, as</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6227" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6227"></td>
        <td id="LC6227" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">I did but a day before writing this last chapter, to see the great</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6228" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6228"></td>
        <td id="LC6228" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">province of houses, dim and blue through the haze of the smoke and</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6229" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6229"></td>
        <td id="LC6229" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">mist, vanishing at last into the vague lower sky, to see the people</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6230" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6230"></td>
        <td id="LC6230" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">walking to and fro among the flower beds on the hill, to see the</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6231" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6231"></td>
        <td id="LC6231" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">sight-seers about the Martian machine that stands there still, to hear</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6232" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6232"></td>
        <td id="LC6232" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">the tumult of playing children, and to recall the time when I saw it</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6233" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6233"></td>
        <td id="LC6233" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">all bright and clear-cut, hard and silent, under the dawn of that last</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6234" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6234"></td>
        <td id="LC6234" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">great day. . . .</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6235" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6235"></td>
        <td id="LC6235" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6236" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6236"></td>
        <td id="LC6236" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">And strangest of all is it to hold my wife’s hand again, and to think</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6237" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6237"></td>
        <td id="LC6237" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">that I have counted her, and that she has counted me, among the dead.</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6238" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6238"></td>
        <td id="LC6238" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td id="L6239" class="blob-num js-line-number" data-line-number="6239"></td>
        <td id="LC6239" class="blob-code blob-code-inner js-file-line">
</td>
      </tr>
</table>
